English: Fera is Bill Poster Priest at the Bill Poster Altar. You shall find her there. I'm sure she is already expecting you.
Traditional_Chinese: 菲拉是爆咒師祭壇上的爆咒師祭司。

English: Find Fera in Billposter Alter
Traditional_Chinese: 去找爆咒師祭壇上的菲拉吧。

English: Fera's Test
Traditional_Chinese: 菲拉的試驗

English: Sury's mind is currently clouded with doubt, as the Guardian had mentioned. In her current state, she will never reach enlightenment regardless of how hard she trains…
Traditional_Chinese: 修利大人為獲得領悟，需要守護者大人所說的領悟的碎片。

English: To help grant her thoughts a renewed sense of clarity, we must bring her a Shard of Enlightenment. First I must test your own personal strength. Do you accept?
Traditional_Chinese: 要獲得領悟的碎片，必需要遭遇許多的危險，所以在那之前測試冒險家大人的實力之後，我再告訴你。做好試驗的準備了嗎？

English: I knew you wouldn't back away from this challenge. Please hunt 60 Small Kern and 40 Kern located in Southern Darkon 3.
Traditional_Chinese: 我就知道你會答應。那麼請消滅位於南得肯 3區的60隻小炎王和40隻炎王，然後再回來吧。

English: We must not falter in the face of adversity!
Traditional_Chinese: 如果連這種程度的試驗也沒有辦法通過，那麼我就無法告訴你有關領悟的碎片的事情。

English: I never doubted your skill for a second!
Traditional_Chinese: 已經回來了嗎？我就知道如果是你，一定可以通過試驗的。

English: Please go and hunt down the Kern as a test of your own strength.
Traditional_Chinese: 請去追捕炎王，以測試你自己的力量。

English: Hunt 60 Small Kern and 40 Kern located in Southern Darkon 3, then talk with Fera.
Traditional_Chinese: 消滅60隻小炎王和40隻炎王，然後回去找菲拉。

English: Out of the Oven and into the Fire
Traditional_Chinese: 尋找自豪之石

English: In order to complete the process required to create a Shard of Enlightenment, we must first acquire an Infernal Stone
Traditional_Chinese: 領悟的碎片要有孕育自豪的石頭，才可以製作。自豪的石頭可以在炎王棲息的地方上找到。

English: Please defeat 30 Captain Kerns and acquire the Infernal Stone which should be located somewhere around them.
Traditional_Chinese: 尋找自豪之石，然後消滅30隻爆炎王並將自豪之石拿去給卡班沛大人。請卡班沛大人製作領悟的碎片。

English: Great! Once you have acquired the Infernal Stone, take it to Capafe and ask about the next step of the process.
Traditional_Chinese: 趕快找出自豪之石，然後回去找卡班沛大人吧。那大人應該正在等你吧。

English: If you wish Sury to return to her original state, this is the only way.
Traditional_Chinese: 如果討厭，就沒有辦法了。但是這樣子，修利大人就無法獲得領悟了..

English: I have been waiting for you. I see that you have acquired an Infernal Stone.
Traditional_Chinese: 已經把自豪之石拿回來啦。我一直在等你。

English: Please hurry, I'm sure Capafe is waiting for us!
Traditional_Chinese: 請快點，我確定卡班沛正在等我們！

English: Hunt 30 Captain Kern, acquire the Infernal Stone, then talk with Capafe.
Traditional_Chinese: 消滅爆炎王 30隻，尋找自豪之石，然後回去找卡班沛吧。

English: Stone of Enlightenment
Traditional_Chinese: 製作領悟的碎片的方法

English: In order to create a Shard of Enlightenment, we will need to fuse together an Infernal Stone and an Angelic Stone.
Traditional_Chinese: 領悟的碎片必需要收集到孕育自豪和意志的石頭，才可以製作。如果拿回來的自豪之石不和意志之石一起使用，那麼就無法發揮任何效果。

English: Please return to Fera and explain to her what it is you need.
Traditional_Chinese: 所以你可以回去找菲拉，並找回孕育有意志的石頭嗎？

English: She will be able to explain in greater detail about how to acquire an Angelic Stone.
Traditional_Chinese: 獲得製作領悟的碎片的其它材料意志之石的方法，去找菲拉就可以知道。

English: We could all use your assistance right now…
Traditional_Chinese: 不再考慮一次看看嗎？我需要你的幫助。

English: Ah! You've returned! What did Capafe have to say of the issue?
Traditional_Chinese: 又回來啦？卡班沛大人怎麼說呢？

English: Ask Fera about the Angelic Stone.
Traditional_Chinese: 快一點回去找菲拉，並找回剩下來的意志之石吧。

English: Look for Angelic Stone
Traditional_Chinese: 尋找意志之石

English: Oh! Of course! It was an Angelic Stone that we require to complete the transmutation!
Traditional_Chinese: 啊！我都忘記了。自豪之石要和意志之石一起使用，才可以製作領悟的碎片。我竟然犯這種失誤..

English: You can find Angelic Stones in Southern Darkon 3 near the Captain Glaphans. Will you please defeat them and acquire the stone?
Traditional_Chinese: 意志之石在南邊巫獸皮皮們所棲息的地方可以找到。在那裡消滅魔巫皮皮 ，找到意志之石，然後再一次拿回去給卡班沛大人吧。

English: Good! Please defeat 60 Captain Glaphan and acquire the Angelic Stone. Once the stone is in your possession, return to Capafe!
Traditional_Chinese: 這一次沒有錯，快一點消滅60隻魔巫皮皮，找出意志之石，然後拿回去給卡班沛大人就可以。

English: Are you giving up?
Traditional_Chinese: Are you giving up?

English: You have found the Angelic Stone! Now I can create a Shard of Enlightenment by combining both of the stones.
Traditional_Chinese: 意志之石也找回來啦。現在可以製作領悟的碎片了。

English: We have no time for idle conversation. Please retrieve the stone!
Traditional_Chinese: 我們沒有時間閒聊。 請取回石頭！

English: Hunt 60 Captain Glaphans, acquire the Angelic Stone, then take it to Capafe for transmutation.
Traditional_Chinese: 消滅魔巫皮皮60隻找出意志之石，然後拿回去給卡班沛。

English: Sury's Realization
Traditional_Chinese: 獲得領悟的修利

English: The process of transmutation required to create the Shard of Enlightenment will take just a moment…
Traditional_Chinese: 已經完成含有自豪和意志的領悟的碎片。全部都是多虧冒險家大人的福。

English: It is finished. Please bring the Shard of Enlightenment to Sury as soon as you can.
Traditional_Chinese: 快一點把這個領悟的碎片拿去給修利大人吧。讓她快一點找回爆咒師英雄的記憶。

English: Thank you. This should help bring the clarity to her thoughts that Sury requires.
Traditional_Chinese: 謝謝你。 這應該有助於使她的想法清晰，這正是修利大人所需要的。

English: It would be most unwise to deny this request…
Traditional_Chinese: 冒險家大人很善變呢。

English: I see you have returned. What has transpired?
Traditional_Chinese: 現在才回來啊。怎麼樣了呢？

English: Please hurry. Sury needs our aid.
Traditional_Chinese: 請快點!修力需要我們的幫助。

English: Hand the Shard of Enlightenment to Sury.
Traditional_Chinese: 將領悟的碎片拿去給修利。

English: In Safe Hands
Traditional_Chinese: 交付給守護者的墜飾

English: This Shard, it has made everything so much clearer! I have recovered the part of myself that I lost along the way. I was once Roentel, Hero Billposter…
Traditional_Chinese: 啊啊，現在我知道了，我所遺失的東西是什麼。

English: I now see the gravity of this situation…the peril that Madrigal is truly in. I understand why Reonan is seeking us out!
Traditional_Chinese: 瑪德利賈正遭遇到危險.. 雷奧南會找我們也是當然的事情吧。我也要和他在一起。

English: First, could you perhaps complete one favor for me? I left my pendant to Capafe before I decided to isolate myself up here on this mountain to train.
Traditional_Chinese: 但是，在那之前你可以在幫我一個忙嗎？事實上一開始修練的時候，我就將和其它英雄們一起分有的墜飾交給卡班沛。請你去找卡班沛，然後找回來那個墜飾回來給我吧。

English: Thank you yet again! Capafe should have the pendant. Go and ask her if she could return it.
Traditional_Chinese: 謝謝！只要告訴卡班沛說我在找墜飾，他一定會馬上交出來的。快去幫我找回我的墜飾吧。

English: This pendant is an important symbol of trust, you must acquire it!
Traditional_Chinese: 如果沒有墜飾，就算我獲得領悟，我也沒有辦法去見我的同伴。

English: I'm glad to hear that Sury has reached this realization.
Traditional_Chinese: 修利大人獲得領悟了，真的是太好了。

English: Capafe should have the pendant. Go and inquire about it.
Traditional_Chinese: 墜飾就在卡班沛那裡。

English: Ask Capafe for Sury's Pendant.
Traditional_Chinese: 向卡班沛要修利的墜飾。

English: Reclaiming the Pendant
Traditional_Chinese: 禁止的地區

English: Ahh the Pendant. When Sury left it to me a long time ago, I kept it in a barren desert, untraversed by man.
Traditional_Chinese: 以前修利大人交付墜飾給我時，我把墜飾保管在人煙罕至的荒涼沙漠裡。

English: Unfortunately at some point, Chimeradons came to discover it and took it for their own. Since then, I have been unable to locate it…
Traditional_Chinese: 不幸的是，在某個時候，變種蝙蝠俠發現了它並將其據為己有。 從那以後，我一直找不到它……

English: Could you please find the pendant for me?
Traditional_Chinese: 冒險家大人可以代替我，去把那個墜飾找回來嗎？雖然我也想去，但是這裡的事情很忙所以沒有辦法..

English: Thank you for your assistance. I feel that the pendant is currently being held by a Chimeradon. Please reclaim it from him then show me so I may rest assured it is returned.
Traditional_Chinese: 謝謝你的幫助。我覺得這個吊墜目前正被一隻變種蝙蝠俠所持有。請從他那裡收回它然後給我看，這樣我就可以放心它會被退回。

English: Please find the pendant. I feel it is partly my responsibility for the pendants disappearance…
Traditional_Chinese: 要是墜飾不見了，修利大人就..

English: You have returned. I hope you have succeeded in acquiring the pendant.
Traditional_Chinese: 謝謝你幫我拿回來。真的是很謝謝。

English: Defeat the Chimeradon and show Capafe the pendant.
Traditional_Chinese: 擊敗變種蝙蝠俠並將吊墜展示給卡班沛。

English: The pendant is currently held by a Chimeradon. Go and retrieve it from his undeserving hands!
Traditional_Chinese: 該吊墜目前由一隻變種蝙蝠俠持有。去從他不配的手中取回它！

English: To the Real Owner
Traditional_Chinese: 物歸原主

English: Thank you. I can now rest assured knowing that the pendant will be returned to its rightful owner.
Traditional_Chinese: 幸好能夠找回墜飾。我還以為會永遠找不到，一直在擔心..

English: Will you please take the pendant to Sury, I'm sure she is anxious to receive it.
Traditional_Chinese: 可以快一點把找回的墜飾拿去給修利大人嗎？他應該等的很焦急吧。

English: Hurry over to Sury, I'm sure she is anxious to receive the pendant.
Traditional_Chinese: 修利大人正在等待你，快一點把墜飾拿去給修利大人吧。

English: Please rethink your decision. This pendant is quite important to Sury.
Traditional_Chinese: 如果沒有墜飾，修利大人就無法證明自己是英雄了..

English: You have recovered the pendant!
Traditional_Chinese: 把墜飾找回來啦！

English: Take the pendant back to Sury.
Traditional_Chinese: 快一點把墜飾拿去給修利大人吧。

English: Deliver the Hero's Pendant to Sury.
Traditional_Chinese: 將英雄的墜飾轉交給修利吧。

English: Billposter Hero's Pendant
Traditional_Chinese: 爆咒師英雄的墜飾

English: We have very little time. Even as we speak, I can sense the growing darkness around us…
Traditional_Chinese: 已經沒有時間可以耽誤了。就算是只有一天，你可以幫我快一點將墜飾交給雷奧南嗎？

English: Will you bring my pendant to Reonan? Please let him know that the time is now for us to unite.
Traditional_Chinese: 請告訴雷奧南我已經準備好了，隨時都可以差遣我。

English: Now that you have the pendant, hurry and give it to Reonan!
Traditional_Chinese: 你不要收下？別這樣，快一點拿去給雷奧南吧！

English: Ahh this is Sury's pendant! The time has once again come that we rise to the challenge before us! With allies like you by our side, we will be prepared for challenges Shade presents us with!
Traditional_Chinese: 喔喔！這個不是最後的英雄墜飾嗎！終於所有的英雄們都可以團圓了。真的是辛苦你了！

English: Please take this pendant to Reonan!
Traditional_Chinese: 快一點將墜飾拿去給雷奧南吧。

English: Bring the Heroes Pendant to Reonan
Traditional_Chinese: 將英雄的墜飾交給雷奧南。

English: Rumble in the Mountains
Traditional_Chinese: 山間的隆隆聲

English: Strange sounds have been coming from the Leren Mountains. I recall Martinyc once speaking of a myth about creatures that roam deep within the mountain caves.
Traditional_Chinese: 樂人山脈一直傳來奇怪的聲音，我記得馬特尼提特曾經說過一個關於在山洞深處漫遊的生物的神話。

English: Could you go check with her to see if she has any information about what could be causing this disturbance?
Traditional_Chinese: 你能去跟她確認一下，看看她是否有任何有關導致這場騷亂的資訊嗎？

English: Martinyc is likely reading her books as always. Go speak with her to find out more information.
Traditional_Chinese: 馬特尼提特可能會一如既往地閱讀她的書，去和她談談以了解更多信息。

English: Leren Mountains is a dangerous place. I do not blame you for wanting to stay within the safety of Flarine.
Traditional_Chinese: Leren Mountains is a dangerous place. I do not blame you for wanting to stay within the safety of Flarine.

English: Oh... the Mayor sent you! And he says that there has been a disturbance in the Leren Mountains...
Traditional_Chinese: Oh... the Mayor sent you! And he says that there has been a disturbance in the Leren Mountains...

English: Seek out Martinyc for information on the rumblings of Leren Mountains.
Traditional_Chinese: 尋找馬特尼提特，了解有關樂人山脈隆隆聲的信息。

English: Meet with Martinyc.
Traditional_Chinese: 與馬特尼提特碰面

English: Demian Deviants
Traditional_Chinese: Demian Deviants

English: I once had a book that contains legends of the beasts that live within the caves of the Leren Mountains... but it was stolen by a pack of Demians during my research.
Traditional_Chinese: I once had a book that contains legends of the beasts that live within the caves of the Leren Mountains... but it was stolen by a pack of Demians during my research.

English: If you return my book to me I may be able to help.
Traditional_Chinese: If you return my book to me I may be able to help.

English: I have a feeling that the Demians still have my book of legends. Search for my book in Madren Town. You may have to get your hands a bit dirty...
Traditional_Chinese: I have a feeling that the Demians still have my book of legends. Search for my book in Madren Town. You may have to get your hands a bit dirty...

English: Madren Town is no place for commoners to travel. I could never expect you to risk your life for my book. Thank you for listening to me anyway.
Traditional_Chinese: Madren Town is no place for commoners to travel. I could never expect you to risk your life for my book. Thank you for listening to me anyway.

English: You found my book, thank you so much! Now to find the legend of the Leren Chasm...
Traditional_Chinese: You found my book, thank you so much! Now to find the legend of the Leren Chasm...

English: Please find my book! I'm positive it is still in Madren Town.
Traditional_Chinese: Please find my book! I'm positive it is still in Madren Town.

English: Kill 15 Demian and find the Legend of Leren Mountains, then return to Martinyc.
Traditional_Chinese: 獵殺15個德米安並找到樂人山的傳說，然後返回馬特尼提特。

English: Magic Mushrooms
Traditional_Chinese: Magic Mushrooms

English: Within this book lies the secrets to the distubances in the Leren Mountains...
Traditional_Chinese: Within this book lies the secrets to the distubances in the Leren Mountains...

English: The legend states that long ago packs of trolls ruled the creatures that made the Leren Mountains their home.
Traditional_Chinese: The legend states that long ago packs of trolls ruled the creatures that made the Leren Mountains their home.

English: Through disease, famine, and bickering betweeen Masquerpets, the trolls retreated from the Leren Mountains into the caves.
Traditional_Chinese: Through disease, famine, and bickering betweeen Masquerpets, the trolls retreated from the Leren Mountains into the caves.

English: The caves were said to contain magical mushrooms that could prolong the life of those who ate them, and it is said that the trolls who once lived in the cave may still live there, in the darkness.
Traditional_Chinese: The caves were said to contain magical mushrooms that could prolong the life of those who ate them, and it is said that the trolls who once lived in the cave may still live there, in the darkness.

English: Perhaps a sample of the local fungi could hold some clues...
Traditional_Chinese: Perhaps a sample of the local fungi could hold some clues...

English: A Lord Mushpang roams just north of Eastern Flarine... Bring a sample of the giant mushroom to the cook Sotta, who can tell you more about the magical properties of Flaris fungi.
Traditional_Chinese: A Lord Mushpang roams just north of Eastern Flarine... Bring a sample of the giant mushroom to the cook Sotta, who can tell you more about the magical properties of Flaris fungi.

English: Oh... are you allergic to mushrooms!? Nevermind... perhaps we can find another person for the job.
Traditional_Chinese: Oh... are you allergic to mushrooms!? Nevermind... perhaps we can find another person for the job.

English: Ah, Flaris fungi! The mushrooms of Flaris have always been said to have magical properties...
Traditional_Chinese: Ah, Flaris fungi! The mushrooms of Flaris have always been said to have magical properties...

English: Collect a sample of the Lord Mushpang and deliver it to Sotta.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect a sample of the Lord Mushpang and deliver it to Sotta.

English: Collect a sample of Flaris Fungi from a Lord Mushpang.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect a sample of Flaris Fungi from a Lord Mushpang.

English: Fun with Fungi
Traditional_Chinese: Fun with Fungi

English: Cooking with Flaris fungi brings out the properties of vitality in a dish...
Traditional_Chinese: Cooking with Flaris fungi brings out the properties of vitality in a dish...

English: It is not hard to believe that a Masquerpet may be able to extend its life by eating the magical fungi.
Traditional_Chinese: It is not hard to believe that a Masquerpet may be able to extend its life by eating the magical fungi.

English: I am a seasoned cook, but Marche knows more about the magic of Madrigal.
Traditional_Chinese: I am a seasoned cook, but Marche knows more about the magic of Madrigal.

English: Marche has always been an expert on the magical properties of the plant life in the region... Go speak with Marche to learn more about the magic within the Flaris fungi.
Traditional_Chinese: Marche has always been an expert on the magical properties of the plant life in the region... Go speak with Marche to learn more about the magic within the Flaris fungi.

English: Magic is powerful, and sometimes scary. I understand if you do not want to speak to Marche.
Traditional_Chinese: Magic is powerful, and sometimes scary. I understand if you do not want to speak to Marche.

English: Oh, hello! So Sotta sent you to me. I wonder if you are prepared to seek out the magic behind these mushrooms...
Traditional_Chinese: Oh, hello! So Sotta sent you to me. I wonder if you are prepared to seek out the magic behind these mushrooms...

English: Speak to Marche to learn more about the magic of Flaris fungi.
Traditional_Chinese: Speak to Marche to learn more about the magic of Flaris fungi.

English: Meet with Marche.
Traditional_Chinese: Meet with Marche.

English: The Mystery of Leren Chasm Part 2
Traditional_Chinese: 勒倫峽谷之謎第 2 部

English: Magic in the Air
Traditional_Chinese: Magic in the Air

English: Hmm... well, I believe the magical properties of these mushrooms originally came from spores that fall from the wings of Mothbees.
Traditional_Chinese: Hmm... well, I believe the magical properties of these mushrooms originally came from spores that fall from the wings of Mothbees.

English: With a sample of Mothbee Spores I may be able to recreate the potent vitality mushrooms that may have allowed a troll to live much longer than normal...
Traditional_Chinese: With a sample of Mothbee Spores I may be able to recreate the potent vitality mushrooms that may have allowed a troll to live much longer than normal...

English: The wings of Mothbees shed spores constantly. Please, go defeat the Mothbees flying above Flaris, and bring me a sample of the spores!
Traditional_Chinese: The wings of Mothbees shed spores constantly. Please, go defeat the Mothbees flying above Flaris, and bring me a sample of the spores!

English: Mothbees can be vicious creatures. If you don't want to get knocked off your broom, it is best if you leave them alone.
Traditional_Chinese: Mothbees can be vicious creatures. If you don't want to get knocked off your broom, it is best if you leave them alone.

English: Ah, you found the spores! I should be able to concoct something from these...
Traditional_Chinese: Ah, you found the spores! I should be able to concoct something from these...

English: Collect a sampling of Mothbee Spore, and bring them back to me.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect a sampling of Mothbee Spore, and bring them back to me.

English: Collect 10 Mothbee Spore and bring them to Marche.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 10 Mothbee Spore and bring them to Marche.

English: Sage Advice
Traditional_Chinese: Sage Advice

English: I feel we are getting close to solving the mystery behind the magic mushrooms in Flaris...
Traditional_Chinese: I feel we are getting close to solving the mystery behind the magic mushrooms in Flaris...

English: The wise sage Radion in the North of Leren Mountains has lived in Flaris longer than most residents have been alive.
Traditional_Chinese: The wise sage Radion in the North of Leren Mountains has lived in Flaris longer than most residents have been alive.

English: Go speak with the sage Radion and see if he knows anything about the power within the Elixir of Vitality!
Traditional_Chinese: Go speak with the sage Radion and see if he knows anything about the power within the Elixir of Vitality!

English: Radion is a bit of a hermit, but he means no harm. I cannot force you to speak to him if you do not want to, though.
Traditional_Chinese: Radion is a bit of a hermit, but he means no harm. I cannot force you to speak to him if you do not want to, though.

English: Hello adventurer... I see Marche has sent you to me with something interesting in hand.
Traditional_Chinese: Hello adventurer... I see Marche has sent you to me with something interesting in hand.

English: Speak with Radion to find out information about the magic within the Elixir of Vitality.
Traditional_Chinese: Speak with Radion to find out information about the magic within the Elixir of Vitality.

English: Meet with Radion.
Traditional_Chinese: Meet with Radion.

English: Seeking Leren Chasm
Traditional_Chinese: 尋找勒倫峽谷

English: Interesting... even with my vast knowledge of Flaris I know very little about the troll migration to the Leren Chasm.
Traditional_Chinese: Interesting... even with my vast knowledge of Flaris I know very little about the troll migration to the Leren Chasm.

English: Perhaps it is time to go explore the Leren Chasm to find out more about the powers behind the Elixir of Vitality.
Traditional_Chinese: 也許是時候去探索勒倫峽谷，以了解更多關於活力藥劑背後的力量。

English: The secret behind the longevity of the Leren Chasm trolls begins with finding the entrance to their cave. Search for the entrance to the Leren Chasm and return to me at once!
Traditional_Chinese: 勒倫峽谷巨魔長壽的秘密始於找到他們洞穴的入口。 尋找勒倫峽谷的入口並立刻回到我身邊！

English: The trolls of the Leren Mountains were believed to be part of a fierce army. If you are not comfortable seeking out the trolls, I will understand.
Traditional_Chinese: The trolls of the Leren Mountains were believed to be part of a fierce army. If you are not comfortable seeking out the trolls, I will understand.

English: I see, so that's where the Leren Chasm is hidden...
Traditional_Chinese: I see, so that's where the Leren Chasm is hidden...

English: Search for the entrance to the Leren Chasm, then return to me.
Traditional_Chinese: 尋找勒倫峽谷的入口，然後回到我身邊。

English: Locate the entrance to the Leren Chasm in the Leren Mountains, and report back to Radion.
Traditional_Chinese: 在勒倫山脈找到勒倫峽谷的入口，然後向拉迪恩匯報。

English: Prepare to Dive!
Traditional_Chinese: Prepare to Dive!

English: Now that we know where the Leren Chasm is, I have stationed a guard outside the cave to prevent anyone from accidently going inside.
Traditional_Chinese: 既然知道了勒倫峽谷的位置，我就在洞外派了守衛，以防有人誤入其中。

English: From here on adventurer, you must delve into the Leren Chasm if we are ever to know the truth. Please speak to the Leren Chasm guard when you are ready to explore the caves.
Traditional_Chinese: 冒險家從這裡開始，如果我們想知道真相，你必須深入勒倫峽谷，當您準備好探索洞穴時，請與勒倫峽谷守衛交談。

English: What you find in the caves of Leren Chasm may be terrifying, but I sense a special kind of bravery within you adventurer... When you are ready go speak to the guard outside the Leren Chasm.
Traditional_Chinese: What you find in the caves of Leren Chasm may be terrifying, but I sense a special kind of bravery within you adventurer... When you are ready go speak to the guard outside the Leren Chasm.

English: Without you, the mystery of the Leren Chasm trolls may never be resolved. No matter though...
Traditional_Chinese: Without you, the mystery of the Leren Chasm trolls may never be resolved. No matter though...

English: Welcome to the Leren Chasm. I am here to prevent those who are ill-prepared from entering and befalling an early death... I see Radion sent you though, you seem prepared.
Traditional_Chinese: Welcome to the Leren Chasm. I am here to prevent those who are ill-prepared from entering and befalling an early death... I see Radion sent you though, you seem prepared.

English: Seek out the guard in front of the Leren Chasm.
Traditional_Chinese: 找到勒倫峽谷前的守衛。

English: Meet with the guard outside the Leren Chasm.
Traditional_Chinese: 在勒倫峽谷外與守衛會面。

English: The Mystery of Leren Chasm Part 3
Traditional_Chinese: 勒倫峽谷之謎第 3 部

English: Cave Diving
Traditional_Chinese: Cave Diving

English: After unblocking the entrance to Leren Chasm, strange creatures have started coming out, causing havoc in the Leren Mountains.
Traditional_Chinese: 勒倫峽谷的入口被打開後，奇怪的生物開始出現，在勒倫山脈造成了巨大的破壞。

English: Go inside the Leren Chasm and clear out the creatures that have been causing us problems.
Traditional_Chinese: 進入勒倫峽谷並清除一直給我們帶來麻煩的生物。

English: Please speak to me when you are ready to enter the Leren Chasm. Inside you will find the Masquerpets I speak of.
Traditional_Chinese: 當你準備好進入勒倫裂谷時，請與我交談。在裡面你會發現我所說的怪物。

English: These unknown creatures are terribly dangerous. Do not approach them if you feel unprepared.
Traditional_Chinese: These unknown creatures are terribly dangerous. Do not approach them if you feel unprepared.

English: Hopefully we will have less disturbences in the Leren Mountains now, thanks to you.
Traditional_Chinese: Hopefully we will have less disturbences in the Leren Mountains now, thanks to you.

English: Eliminate 20 Deep Cave Gorilla and Cavern Larva.
Traditional_Chinese: Eliminate 20 Deep Cave Gorilla and Cavern Larva.

English: Enter the Leren Chasm, then kill 20 Deep Cave Gorilla and 20 Cavern Larva.
Traditional_Chinese: 進入勒倫峽谷，然後殺死 20 隻深洞大猩猩和 20 隻洞穴幼蟲。

English: Creepy Crawlers
Traditional_Chinese: Creepy Crawlers

English: While inside the Leren Chasm there were no sign of the trolls? Go back inside and push deeper within the caves to look for more evidence.
Traditional_Chinese: While inside the Leren Chasm there were no sign of the trolls? Go back inside and push deeper within the caves to look for more evidence.

English: Please speak to me when you are ready to enter the Leren Chasm once again. You will need to go past where you faced the Cavern Larva this time to find more information.
Traditional_Chinese: Please speak to me when you are ready to enter the Leren Chasm once again. You will need to go past where you faced the Cavern Larva this time to find more information.

English: The situation will only become more dangerous the deeper within the Leren Chasm you go. Stop now if you are scared.
Traditional_Chinese: The situation will only become more dangerous the deeper within the Leren Chasm you go. Stop now if you are scared.

English: Perhaps this Broken Vial was once an Elixir of Vitality. It seems the magic within was used long ago, however...
Traditional_Chinese: Perhaps this Broken Vial was once an Elixir of Vitality. It seems the magic within was used long ago, however...

English: Eliminate 20 Radioactive Long Legs, and collect a Broken Vial from the Queen Long Legs.
Traditional_Chinese: Eliminate 20 Radioactive Long Legs, and collect a Broken Vial from the Queen Long Legs.

English: Enter the Leren Chasm, then kill 20 Radioactive Long Legs and obtain the Broken Vial from the Queen Long Legs.
Traditional_Chinese: Enter the Leren Chasm, then kill 20 Radioactive Long Legs and obtain the Broken Vial from the Queen Long Legs.

English: Grabbed by the Ghouls
Traditional_Chinese: Grabbed by the Ghouls

English: The Queen Long Legs held evidence that the Elixir of Vitality was once real. But still, there have been no sightings of trolls within your journeys through the Leren Chasm.
Traditional_Chinese: The Queen Long Legs held evidence that the Elixir of Vitality was once real. But still, there have been no sightings of trolls within your journeys through the Leren Chasm.

English: There must be more to the Leren Chasm that has yet to be uncovered. If you are feeling brave, descend deeper within the caves, and see what may be waiting for us.
Traditional_Chinese: There must be more to the Leren Chasm that has yet to be uncovered. If you are feeling brave, descend deeper within the caves, and see what may be waiting for us.

English: Please speak to me when you are ready to enter the Leren Chasm once again. You will need to go past where you faced the Queen Long Legs this time to find new information.
Traditional_Chinese: Please speak to me when you are ready to enter the Leren Chasm once again. You will need to go past where you faced the Queen Long Legs this time to find new information.

English: The Queen Long Legs was a powerful foe. I am sure the remaining Masuqerpets within the Leren Chasm will only get stronger. Rest here for now if you are not ready.
Traditional_Chinese: The Queen Long Legs was a powerful foe. I am sure the remaining Masuqerpets within the Leren Chasm will only get stronger. Rest here for now if you are not ready.

English: The souls of the Nightmist creatures have an interesting property... when looking through the glassy orb that contains the soul itself, it faintly looks like the face of a troll.
Traditional_Chinese: The souls of the Nightmist creatures have an interesting property... when looking through the glassy orb that contains the soul itself, it faintly looks like the face of a troll.

English: Eliminate 20 Cavern Nightmist and the Nightmist Empress, and collect 10 Soul of the Nightmist.
Traditional_Chinese: Eliminate 20 Cavern Nightmist and the Nightmist Empress, and collect 10 Soul of the Nightmist.

English: Enter the Leren Chasm, then kill 20 Cavern Nightmist and the Nightmist Empress. Collect 10 Souls of the Nightmist.
Traditional_Chinese: Enter the Leren Chasm, then kill 20 Cavern Nightmist and the Nightmist Empress. Collect 10 Souls of the Nightmist.

English: Trolling Flaris
Traditional_Chinese: Trolling Flaris

English: I have contacted the experts of Flaris history and magic to review the findings surrounding the interesting properties of the souls of the Nightmist.
Traditional_Chinese: I have contacted the experts of Flaris history and magic to review the findings surrounding the interesting properties of the souls of the Nightmist.

English: Shockingly... they have come to the conclusion that these Nightmist creatures were likely once trolls themselves. The Elixir of Vitality may have given them unending life in a new form.
Traditional_Chinese: Shockingly... they have come to the conclusion that these Nightmist creatures were likely once trolls themselves. The Elixir of Vitality may have given them unending life in a new form.

English: That explains why no evidence of trolls were found within the Leren Chasm today. The trolls of the past evolved into something new... the Nightmist.
Traditional_Chinese: That explains why no evidence of trolls were found within the Leren Chasm today. The trolls of the past evolved into something new... the Nightmist.

English: I am curious, however, if there is something we missed along the way. Go inside the Leren Chasm once more and make sure there's nothing we left behind.
Traditional_Chinese: I am curious, however, if there is something we missed along the way. Go inside the Leren Chasm once more and make sure there's nothing we left behind.

English: Please speak to me when you are ready to enter the Leren Chasm once again. This trip will be your last. Make sure to leave no stone unturned, so we can close the case on the mystery of the Leren Chasm.
Traditional_Chinese: Please speak to me when you are ready to enter the Leren Chasm once again. This trip will be your last. Make sure to leave no stone unturned, so we can close the case on the mystery of the Leren Chasm.

English: You have made great progress figuring out the mysteries within the Leren Chasm. Maybe there is nothing left to explore anymore.
Traditional_Chinese: You have made great progress figuring out the mysteries within the Leren Chasm. Maybe there is nothing left to explore anymore.

English: Welcome back, adventurer! I have heard from everyone the great work you have done investigating the strange sounds within the Leren Chasm.
Traditional_Chinese: Welcome back, adventurer! I have heard from everyone the great work you have done investigating the strange sounds within the Leren Chasm.

English: It seems to me the Caveman Chief you encountered was the last of its kind in Flaris. Perhaps it simply held on to life as a way to protect its kin, even those that transformed into the horrid Nightmist.
Traditional_Chinese: It seems to me the Caveman Chief you encountered was the last of its kind in Flaris. Perhaps it simply held on to life as a way to protect its kin, even those that transformed into the horrid Nightmist.

English: For now, I think the mystery of the Leren Chasm has been solved. Well done!
Traditional_Chinese: For now, I think the mystery of the Leren Chasm has been solved. Well done!

English: Eliminate the Caveman Chief and share the news with the Mayor of Flarine.
Traditional_Chinese: Eliminate the Caveman Chief and share the news with the Mayor of Flarine.

English: Enter the Leren Chasm, then kill the Caveman Chief.
Traditional_Chinese: Enter the Leren Chasm, then kill the Caveman Chief.

English: The Mystery of Leren Chasm Part 1
Traditional_Chinese: The Mystery of Leren Chasm Part 1

English: Remnant of Ishirut Part 1
Traditional_Chinese: Remnant of Ishirut Part 1

English: Trouble in the Sky
Traditional_Chinese: Trouble in the Sky

English: The weather lately has been terrible! Recently lightning has been striking airships on route to Saint City, causing delays in our shipments.
Traditional_Chinese: The weather lately has been terrible! Recently lightning has been striking airships on route to Saint City, causing delays in our shipments.

English: I wonder what has caused all the bad weather lately? I am still on duty here for a while longer.
Traditional_Chinese: I wonder what has caused all the bad weather lately? I am still on duty here for a while longer.

English: Parine helps manage the Station with me. She acts as a scion of the great Elementor hero, Lillip.
Traditional_Chinese: Parine helps manage the Station with me. She acts as a scion of the great Elementor hero, Lillip.

English: Parine may know why the skies have been so angry lately. Go speak with her please!
Traditional_Chinese: Parine may know why the skies have been so angry lately. Go speak with her please!

English: The lightning is out of control... perhaps you can help us another time.
Traditional_Chinese: The lightning is out of control... perhaps you can help us another time.

English: It is true, the airship deliveries have stopped due to lightning... We must get to the bottom of this, for Saint City.
Traditional_Chinese: It is true, the airship deliveries have stopped due to lightning... We must get to the bottom of this, for Saint City.

English: Find Parine and let her know of the airship situation.
Traditional_Chinese: Find Parine and let her know of the airship situation.

English: Meet with Parine.
Traditional_Chinese: Meet with Parine.

English: Grab a Bull by the Horns
Traditional_Chinese: Grab a Bull by the Horns

English: We need some sort of lightning rod to attract the storm's fury away from the airships heading into Saint City...
Traditional_Chinese: We need some sort of lightning rod to attract the storm's fury away from the airships heading into Saint City...

English: I am unsure of who could build such a device, but you will certainly need a large amount of metal to do it.
Traditional_Chinese: I am unsure of who could build such a device, but you will certainly need a large amount of metal to do it.

English: The largest piece of unrefined metal in Saint Morning hangs off the head of the Lord Dumb Bull... Defeat the Lord and collect the Metallurgical Bull Ring!
Traditional_Chinese: The largest piece of unrefined metal in Saint Morning hangs off the head of the Lord Dumb Bull... Defeat the Lord and collect the Metallurgical Bull Ring!

English: I suppose we could collect scrap metal...
Traditional_Chinese: I suppose we could collect scrap metal...

English: You have found the ring!
Traditional_Chinese: You have found the ring!

English: Hunt down the Lord Dumb Bull and take its ring.
Traditional_Chinese: Hunt down the Lord Dumb Bull and take its ring.

English: Collect a Metallurgical Bull Ring from the Lord Dumb Bull.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect a Metallurgical Bull Ring from the Lord Dumb Bull.

English: Ring of Power
Traditional_Chinese: Ring of Power

English: I only know of the ring's metallurgical properties.
Traditional_Chinese: I only know of the ring's metallurgical properties.

English: The Strange Collector may know more about what the bull ring can do.
Traditional_Chinese: The Strange Collector may know more about what the bull ring can do.

English: Keakoon are not that scary...
Traditional_Chinese: Keakoon are not that scary...

English: *Snort* Well look at that, a Metallurgical Bull Ring! I will need to thank Parine later for sending you to me with this precious trophy.
Traditional_Chinese: *Snort* Well look at that, a Metallurgical Bull Ring! I will need to thank Parine later for sending you to me with this precious trophy.

English: Go speak with the Strange Collector when you have a moment.
Traditional_Chinese: Go speak with the Strange Collector when you have a moment.

English: Meet with the Strange Collector.
Traditional_Chinese: Meet with the Strange Collector.

English: Expert Metallurgist Colack
Traditional_Chinese: 冶金專家克勒

English: Hmmm, well I guess I will not get to keep the ring after all if it is needed to create a lightning rod.
Traditional_Chinese: Hmmm, well I guess I will not get to keep the ring after all if it is needed to create a lightning rod.

English: I have heard that ore from meteorites has an interesting reaction with the ring.
Traditional_Chinese: I have heard that ore from meteorites has an interesting reaction with the ring.

English: Colack from Saint City could certaintly craft such a device if you can find the rare ore!
Traditional_Chinese: 聖城的克勒，要是能找到稀有礦石，肯定能做出這樣的裝置！

English: *Snarl* We will just have to weather the storm then...
Traditional_Chinese: *Snarl* We will just have to weather the storm then...

English: The Strange Collector was smart to send you to me. With the right materials we can create a lightning rod to protect the Saint City Station.
Traditional_Chinese: The Strange Collector was smart to send you to me. With the right materials we can create a lightning rod to protect the Saint City Station.

English: Find Colack in Saint City and see if he can assist in crafting a lightning rod.
Traditional_Chinese: 去聖城找克勒，看看他能不能幫忙製作避雷針。

English: Speak with Colack in Saint City.
Traditional_Chinese: 與聖城的克勒談一談。

English: Picking Up the Pieces
Traditional_Chinese: Picking Up the Pieces

English: There has been an influx of Meteoritill lately ever since a meteorite fell in the Fantasy Desert.
Traditional_Chinese: There has been an influx of Meteoritill lately ever since a meteorite fell in the Fantasy Desert.

English: If I combine the Metallurgic Bull Ring, some Meteoritill, and Cardpuppet gears, I believe I can create a lightning rod strong enough to draw lightning away from the airships heading to Saint City!
Traditional_Chinese: If I combine the Metallurgic Bull Ring, some Meteoritill, and Cardpuppet gears, I believe I can create a lightning rod strong enough to draw lightning away from the airships heading to Saint City!

English: Search for Meteoritill at the meteor crash site in the Fantasy Desert, and defeat Cardpuppets to retrieve their gears.
Traditional_Chinese: Search for Meteoritill at the meteor crash site in the Fantasy Desert, and defeat Cardpuppets to retrieve their gears.

English: Meteoritill is safe to handle, I assure you...
Traditional_Chinese: Meteoritill is safe to handle, I assure you...

English: Wonderful! Now that we have all the materials, it is time to finally craft the lightning rod.
Traditional_Chinese: Wonderful! Now that we have all the materials, it is time to finally craft the lightning rod.

English: Collect Meteoritill in the Fantasy Desert and gears from Cardpuppets.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect Meteoritill in the Fantasy Desert and gears from Cardpuppets.

English: Collect 5 Meteoritill and 10 Cardpuppet Gears.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 5 Meteoritill and 10 Cardpuppet Gears.

English: Supercharged
Traditional_Chinese: 能量過載

English: Aha, we've done it! The lightning rod is complete!
Traditional_Chinese: Aha, we've done it! The lightning rod is complete!

English: Supercharge the lightning rod by visiting the Altar of Violet, then deliver the lightning rod to Tina and hope that it protects the Station.
Traditional_Chinese: 拜訪紫羅蘭祭壇，為避雷針充電，然後將避雷針交給蒂娜，希望它能保護空間站。

English: Without power the lightning rod we've built has no use...
Traditional_Chinese: Without power the lightning rod we've built has no use...

English: Thank you for delivering the lightning rod! I believe with this installed our airships will be safe.
Traditional_Chinese: Thank you for delivering the lightning rod! I believe with this installed our airships will be safe.

English: You cannot deliver the lightning rod until has been supercharged...
Traditional_Chinese: You cannot deliver the lightning rod until has been supercharged...

English: Locate the Altar of Violet, supercharge the lightning rod, then report to Tina.
Traditional_Chinese: 找到紫羅蘭祭壇，為避雷針增壓，然後向蒂娜報告。

English: Spark in the Dark
Traditional_Chinese: Spark in the Dark

English: Something still bothers me... why are these storms happening at all? Maybe the Chairman of the History Society, Gothante, might know.
Traditional_Chinese: 有些事情仍然困擾著我……為什麼會發生這些風暴？ 說不定歷史學會會長高譚提拉知道。

English: Seek out a forum with Gothante, and figure out what is going on with the weather.
Traditional_Chinese: 尋找與高譚提拉的論壇，了解天氣情況。

English: Well... at least the airships are safe for now. I wonder why all the bad weather, though?
Traditional_Chinese: Well... at least the airships are safe for now. I wonder why all the bad weather, though?

English: The storms lately have raged on for far too long! I have a feeling I know what has caused these storms.
Traditional_Chinese: The storms lately have raged on for far too long! I have a feeling I know what has caused these storms.

English: Find Gothante and see if he knows what is happening with the weather.
Traditional_Chinese: 找到高譚提拉，看看他是否知道天氣情況。

English: Meet with Gothante.
Traditional_Chinese: 與高譚提拉碰面

English: Ishirut's Return?
Traditional_Chinese: Ishirut's Return?

English: Over many years our society has collected rare texts that reveal the history of the world of Madrigal. Eons ago a god of lightning helped create this world. That god was named Ishirut.
Traditional_Chinese: Over many years our society has collected rare texts that reveal the history of the world of Madrigal. Eons ago a god of lightning helped create this world. That god was named Ishirut.

English: Perhaps ripples of Ishirut's spirit have returned to give us a sign, but I have no connection to the gods. Perhaps this is work for a mystic of sorts.
Traditional_Chinese: Perhaps ripples of Ishirut's spirit have returned to give us a sign, but I have no connection to the gods. Perhaps this is work for a mystic of sorts.

English: I believe that YaoRin of the MewMew people has the power to reveal the truth, but the MewMew clan are distrusting of most humans. Anyway, I recommend you go speak with YaoRin and see if they are willing to cooperate. They are our best chance at learning what the gods are up to.
Traditional_Chinese: I believe that YaoRin of the MewMew people has the power to reveal the truth, but the MewMew clan are distrusting of most humans. Anyway, I recommend you go speak with YaoRin and see if they are willing to cooperate. They are our best chance at learning what the gods are up to.

English: While a bit standoffish, the MewMew clan is not that scary...
Traditional_Chinese: While a bit standoffish, the MewMew clan is not that scary...

English: *Hmmph* So you were sent by that man Gothante. Even so, I do not trust you one bit.
Traditional_Chinese: *哼*原來你是那個高譚提拉派來的。 即便如此，我一點也不信任你。

English: Find YaoRin in the MewMew camp just outside the walls of western Saint City.
Traditional_Chinese: Find YaoRin in the MewMew camp just outside the walls of western Saint City.

English: Speak to YaoRin.
Traditional_Chinese: Speak to YaoRin.

English: Remnant of Ishirut Part 2
Traditional_Chinese: Remnant of Ishirut Part 2

English: YaoRin's Trust
Traditional_Chinese: YaoRin's Trust

English: I see... you wish to see my powers of the mind. Well, the MewMew people are not very trusting of outsiders.
Traditional_Chinese: I see... you wish to see my powers of the mind. Well, the MewMew people are not very trusting of outsiders.

English: If you really want to have a fortune read you will need permission from the leader of the MewMew clan, Locku. Before I will allow you to speak to Locku, you must prove yourself to me.
Traditional_Chinese: If you really want to have a fortune read you will need permission from the leader of the MewMew clan, Locku. Before I will allow you to speak to Locku, you must prove yourself to me.

English: Prove your worth by bringing me the Hearts of Red Otem who reside in the Iblis Dungeon. If you can do that, then I will let you speak with our leader.
Traditional_Chinese: Prove your worth by bringing me the Hearts of Red Otem who reside in the Iblis Dungeon. If you can do that, then I will let you speak with our leader.

English: If you cannot do a simple task then you are not worthy of to speak to the MewMew clan leader...
Traditional_Chinese: If you cannot do a simple task then you are not worthy of to speak to the MewMew clan leader...

English: We distrust you humans, but I see you have helped YaoRin in eliminating our mortal enemies, the Otems.
Traditional_Chinese: We distrust you humans, but I see you have helped YaoRin in eliminating our mortal enemies, the Otems.

English: Go find Hearts of the Red Otem in the Iblis Dungeon.
Traditional_Chinese: Go find Hearts of the Red Otem in the Iblis Dungeon.

English: Collect 3 Heart of Red Otem.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 3 Heart of Red Otem.

English: Locku, Leader of the MewMew
Traditional_Chinese: Locku, Leader of the MewMew

English: I will share with you an explanation of our disdain for the Otems... We believe that eons ago, Otems stole the remaining power from an ancient god named Shelid that was a bastion of protection for this land long ago.
Traditional_Chinese: I will share with you an explanation of our disdain for the Otems... We believe that eons ago, Otems stole the remaining power from an ancient god named Shelid that was a bastion of protection for this land long ago.

English: While you may have proven yourself enough to YaoRin to speak to me, you must further show that you are worthy to receive the MewMew clan's assistance.
Traditional_Chinese: While you may have proven yourself enough to YaoRin to speak to me, you must further show that you are worthy to receive the MewMew clan's assistance.

English: Thin the herd of Totemia that taint the Southern Hillid Mountains and destroy their leader. If you can take down the leader of the Totemia, then you have earned our trust enough for YaoRin's help... once.
Traditional_Chinese: Thin the herd of Totemia that taint the Southern Hillid Mountains and destroy their leader. If you can take down the leader of the Totemia, then you have earned our trust enough for YaoRin's help... once.

English: If you refuse this task, the MewMew will not assist you in your mission.
Traditional_Chinese: If you refuse this task, the MewMew will not assist you in your mission.

English: You have earned the MewMew clan's trust... for now.
Traditional_Chinese: You have earned the MewMew clan's trust... for now.

English: Go defeat Totemia and eliminate their leader.
Traditional_Chinese: Go defeat Totemia and eliminate their leader.

English: Kill 20 Totemia and 1 Lord Totemia.
Traditional_Chinese: Kill 20 Totemia and 1 Lord Totemia.

English: The Third Eye Opens
Traditional_Chinese: The Third Eye Opens

English: I will grant you one reading, but I require special materials to perform the ritual.
Traditional_Chinese: I will grant you one reading, but I require special materials to perform the ritual.

English: Please bring me a Black Curse Book and 5 Black Heroca from the Garden of Rhisis.
Traditional_Chinese: 請帶給我一本黑色詛咒書和 5 個來自黎席斯花園的黑色英雄。

English: Do not fear the future, for it is inevitable.
Traditional_Chinese: Do not fear the future, for it is inevitable.

English: With these items I can perform the ritual to read from the fabric of time. We will finally know the true meaning of these storms!
Traditional_Chinese: With these items I can perform the ritual to read from the fabric of time. We will finally know the true meaning of these storms!

English: Search the Garden of Rhisis for a Black Curse Book and the Black Heroca plant.
Traditional_Chinese: 在黎席斯花園中尋找黑色詛咒書和黑色英雄植物。

English: Collect 5 Black Heroca and 1 Black Curse Book.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 5 Black Heroca and 1 Black Curse Book.

English: Seeing the Light
Traditional_Chinese: Seeing the Light

English: The murky darkness clouding our vision of the future clears up with the use of these special herbs, when combined with a powerful cursed item. It takes a toll on me every time...
Traditional_Chinese: The murky darkness clouding our vision of the future clears up with the use of these special herbs, when combined with a powerful cursed item. It takes a toll on me every time...

English: The darkness is lifting! And the truth is just as I feared... remnants of the lightning god, Ishirut, have stirred, creating a powerful beast that hides in the stormy mountains of the Garden of Rhisis...
Traditional_Chinese: The darkness is lifting! And the truth is just as I feared... remnants of the lightning god, Ishirut, have stirred, creating a powerful beast that hides in the stormy mountains of the Garden of Rhisis...

English: I am too weak from the ritual to do anything about the remnant of Ishirut, but here is a map that will lead you to where the creature is hiding.
Traditional_Chinese: I am too weak from the ritual to do anything about the remnant of Ishirut, but here is a map that will lead you to where the creature is hiding.

English: Ishirut was known to be one of the most powerful beings in existence... fear of them is nothing to be ashamed of.
Traditional_Chinese: Ishirut was known to be one of the most powerful beings in existence... fear of them is nothing to be ashamed of.

English: Ah, the MewMew clan sent word of your arrival. I have been stationed outside this ruined temple to prevent travelers from facing death before their time has come. Inside are beasts of great power.
Traditional_Chinese: Ah, the MewMew clan sent word of your arrival. I have been stationed outside this ruined temple to prevent travelers from facing death before their time has come. Inside are beasts of great power.

English: Only enter if you feel truly prepared for a difficult challenge. I have heard rumors that the beast in the deepest part of the ruins holds a remnant of an ancient god's power.
Traditional_Chinese: Only enter if you feel truly prepared for a difficult challenge. I have heard rumors that the beast in the deepest part of the ruins holds a remnant of an ancient god's power.

English: Follow the map to find the creature's lair.
Traditional_Chinese: Follow the map to find the creature's lair.

English: Find the lair of Ishirut's remnant.
Traditional_Chinese: Find the lair of Ishirut's remnant.

English: Remnant of Ishirut Part 3
Traditional_Chinese: Remnant of Ishirut Part 3

English: Jeepers Creepers
Traditional_Chinese: Jeepers Creepers

English: A small group recently went inside the catacombs, but have not returned in several hours. I fear they have fallen to whatever creatures may be inside.
Traditional_Chinese: A small group recently went inside the catacombs, but have not returned in several hours. I fear they have fallen to whatever creatures may be inside.

English: A thick webbing has appeared around the entrance, and I hear loud footsteps not far within the depths of the ruins.
Traditional_Chinese: A thick webbing has appeared around the entrance, and I hear loud footsteps not far within the depths of the ruins.

English: Go inside and find out what happened to the group before you.
Traditional_Chinese: Go inside and find out what happened to the group before you.

English: Scared of a few spiders? Those poor adventurers...
Traditional_Chinese: Scared of a few spiders? Those poor adventurers...

English: I see... so you found only the remains of their armor. It is a shame what has happened, but you seem to be strong enough to continue pushing deeper into the ruins.
Traditional_Chinese: I see... so you found only the remains of their armor. It is a shame what has happened, but you seem to be strong enough to continue pushing deeper into the ruins.

English: Investigate the disappearance of the lost adventurers.
Traditional_Chinese: Investigate the disappearance of the lost adventurers.

English: Collect 10 Clothing Scraps and 1 Broken Shield.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 10 Clothing Scraps and 1 Broken Shield.

English: Over Encumbered
Traditional_Chinese: Over Encumbered

English: One thing still troubles me though... The thick webbing around the entrance can be explained by the spiders, but what creature could have such loud, stomping footsteps?
Traditional_Chinese: One thing still troubles me though... The thick webbing around the entrance can be explained by the spiders, but what creature could have such loud, stomping footsteps?

English: Go deeper into the ruins and find out what is making that loud thumping noise.
Traditional_Chinese: Go deeper into the ruins and find out what is making that loud thumping noise.

English: I won't blame you for avoing whatever beast awaits the next group of adventurers. It sounds big...
Traditional_Chinese: I won't blame you for avoing whatever beast awaits the next group of adventurers. It sounds big...

English: Sadly it seems the adventurers all fell to the power of the the massive gorilla inside the ruins... I believe the group would have wanted you to finish what they set out to do. Here, take their belongings. Perhaps it will help.
Traditional_Chinese: Sadly it seems the adventurers all fell to the power of the the massive gorilla inside the ruins... I believe the group would have wanted you to finish what they set out to do. Here, take their belongings. Perhaps it will help.

English: Investigate the loud sound of footsteps within the catacombs.
Traditional_Chinese: Investigate the loud sound of footsteps within the catacombs.

English: Collect 10 Dungeoneer's Pack and 1 Broken Sword.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 10 Dungeoneer's Pack and 1 Broken Sword.

English: Petrified Wood
Traditional_Chinese: Petrified Wood

English: From the information we have available, the remnant of Ishirut hides in the very heart of the catacombs.
Traditional_Chinese: From the information we have available, the remnant of Ishirut hides in the very heart of the catacombs.

English: You have already made it further than the last group, keep pushing and find out what lies in store.
Traditional_Chinese: You have already made it further than the last group, keep pushing and find out what lies in store.

English: You've made it so far... why give up now?
Traditional_Chinese: You've made it so far... why give up now?

English: Fascinating! The bark from the large tree creature seems to have the symbol of Shelid etched on the surface... Does this mean that the catacombs were originally an altar to Shelid themself?
Traditional_Chinese: Fascinating! The bark from the large tree creature seems to have the symbol of Shelid etched on the surface... Does this mean that the catacombs were originally an altar to Shelid themself?

English: Investigate the the catacombs further, there is still more to see.
Traditional_Chinese: Investigate the the catacombs further, there is still more to see.

English: Collect 10 Tainted Root and 1 Cracked Bark of Shelid.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 10 Tainted Root and 1 Cracked Bark of Shelid.

English: A Shocking Conclusion
Traditional_Chinese: A Shocking Conclusion

English: So many mysteries still to unfold... but I believe you are now close to the heart of the catacombs.
Traditional_Chinese: So many mysteries still to unfold... but I believe you are now close to the heart of the catacombs.

English: Enter once more and clear out the remnant of Ishirut if you are capable of doing so. Prepare yourself before entering again, for I fear the beast within the depths of the ruins is far stronger than you could imagine.
Traditional_Chinese: Enter once more and clear out the remnant of Ishirut if you are capable of doing so. Prepare yourself before entering again, for I fear the beast within the depths of the ruins is far stronger than you could imagine.

English: After all this effort... now is when you back away from danger?
Traditional_Chinese: After all this effort... now is when you back away from danger?

English: What you have uncovered has tremendous impact on our knowledge of the past! Congratulations on making it through the deadly Rhisis Catacombs, and uncovering the secrets of the past.
Traditional_Chinese: 你的發現對我們對過去的認識產生了巨大的影響！ 恭喜您成功穿越致命的黎席斯地下墓穴，並揭開了過去的秘密。

English: Based on the evidence you have gathered, we believe that the Rhisis Catacombs were once a holy ground for the god of earth, Shelid.
Traditional_Chinese: 根據您收集到的證據，我們相信黎席斯地下墓穴曾經是大地之神謝利德的聖地。

English: Along the way, a feud between Shelid and Ishirut must have occurred, leaving behind remnants of both gods that empowered the masquerpets that would eventually call the catacombs their home.
Traditional_Chinese: Along the way, a feud between Shelid and Ishirut must have occurred, leaving behind remnants of both gods that empowered the masquerpets that would eventually call the catacombs their home.

English: With the Temple Guardian eliminated, we can rest easy knowing that Saint City is safe again, thanks to you!
Traditional_Chinese: With the Temple Guardian eliminated, we can rest easy knowing that Saint City is safe again, thanks to you!

English: Eliminate the remnant of Ishirut and anything in your way to get there.
Traditional_Chinese: Eliminate the remnant of Ishirut and anything in your way to get there.

English: Kill 20 Old Ruts, 10 Bolt Otem, and the Temple Guardian.
Traditional_Chinese: Kill 20 Old Ruts, 10 Bolt Otem, and the Temple Guardian.

English: Envy Depths Part 1
Traditional_Chinese: Envy Depths Part 1

English: Pandora's Box
Traditional_Chinese: Pandora's Box

English: *Psst* Hey, you! Can you come help an old box like me?
Traditional_Chinese: *Psst* Hey, you! Can you come help an old box like me?

English: I haven't seen an adventurer here in years, you must be tough. I was turned into this box a long time ago by an annoying clown... Could you help return me to my original form? I can help you become so much stronger if you do...
Traditional_Chinese: I haven't seen an adventurer here in years, you must be tough. I was turned into this box a long time ago by an annoying clown... Could you help return me to my original form? I can help you become so much stronger if you do...

English: *Cackle* Wonderful hahahaha! You can start by releasing the magic chains that bind me to this location. Collect a Corrupted Symbol of Shade from a Violet monster in Darkon 1.
Traditional_Chinese: *Cackle* Wonderful hahahaha! You can start by releasing the magic chains that bind me to this location. Collect a Corrupted Symbol of Shade from a Violet monster in Darkon 1.

English: FOOL! You ignore the gifts of someone like me!? You will regret this...
Traditional_Chinese: FOOL! You ignore the gifts of someone like me!? You will regret this...

English: Ahhh... I feel the first binding being released. One down, three to go.
Traditional_Chinese: Ahhh... I feel the first binding being released. One down, three to go.

English: Your incompetence is pathetic... GO! Defeat a Violet masquerpet to release the first binding.
Traditional_Chinese: Your incompetence is pathetic... GO! Defeat a Violet masquerpet to release the first binding.

English: Collect a Corrupted Symbol of Shade from a Violet masquerpet in Darkon 1.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect a Corrupted Symbol of Shade from a Violet masquerpet in Darkon 1.

English: Throwing Shade
Traditional_Chinese: Throwing Shade

English: Well you've proven yourself to have some strength at least. There are still three more bindings to shatter though.
Traditional_Chinese: Well you've proven yourself to have some strength at least. There are still three more bindings to shatter though.

English: You won't find anymore Symbols of Shade with that same level of power. I don't care where you get them from, but bring me 5 normal Symbols of Shade to break the next binding. Symbols of Shade drop from Violet masquerpets.
Traditional_Chinese: You won't find anymore Symbols of Shade with that same level of power. I don't care where you get them from, but bring me 5 normal Symbols of Shade to break the next binding. Symbols of Shade drop from Violet masquerpets.

English: WHAT!? You don't trust me or something?
Traditional_Chinese: WHAT!? You don't trust me or something?

English: Wahahahaha! You really are something, aren't you! I'm surprised you were powerful enough to take down so many Violet masquerpets. And with that, the second binding has been released!
Traditional_Chinese: Wahahahaha! You really are something, aren't you! I'm surprised you were powerful enough to take down so many Violet masquerpets. And with that, the second binding has been released!

English: Can't you figure this out on your own? Go kill Violet masquerpets for their Symbols of Shade!
Traditional_Chinese: Can't you figure this out on your own? Go kill Violet masquerpets for their Symbols of Shade!

English: Collect 5 Symbol of Shade from Violet masquerpets.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 5 Symbol of Shade from Violet masquerpets.

English: Font of Power
Traditional_Chinese: Font of Power

English: I can feel my power slowly returning... HAHAHAHAHA! Yes... yes... time for another binding to be released!
Traditional_Chinese: I can feel my power slowly returning... HAHAHAHAHA! Yes... yes... time for another binding to be released!

English: Take the cup from inside my chest and fill it with the powers from the nearby Altar of Violet.
Traditional_Chinese: 從我胸口取出杯子，用附近紫羅蘭祭壇的力量填充它。

English: You could have had all the power... and now you will have nothing!
Traditional_Chinese: You could have had all the power... and now you will have nothing!

English: Ahhhh... Ahahahahaha... the weakness brought on from these bindings is finally being released. Just one binding left...
Traditional_Chinese: Ahhhh... Ahahahahaha... the weakness brought on from these bindings is finally being released. Just one binding left...

English: You're wasting time! Go to the Altar of Violet, now!!
Traditional_Chinese: 你在浪費時間！ 現在去紫羅蘭祭壇！！

English: Visit the Atlar of Violet in Darkon 1.
Traditional_Chinese: Visit the Atlar of Violet in Darkon 1.

English: An Evil Set Free
Traditional_Chinese: An Evil Set Free

English: Just one binding is left... we must break it so I can grant you new strength!
Traditional_Chinese: Just one binding is left... we must break it so I can grant you new strength!

English: That foolish clown thought they hid his cache of power out of reach of my minions... HA! How wrong he was... Collect the cache and my bindings to this place will finally be broken! No one will be able to stop me either... unless that rat Reodos is still around.
Traditional_Chinese: That foolish clown thought they hid his cache of power out of reach of my minions... HA! How wrong he was... Collect the cache and my bindings to this place will finally be broken! No one will be able to stop me either... unless that rat Reodos is still around.

English: ARGH!! You must set me free!
Traditional_Chinese: ARGH!! You must set me free!

English: Oh no... that Ancimys was one shackled by Bubble himself! It was once an ancient wizard with powerful black magic... this is very bad news.
Traditional_Chinese: Oh no... that Ancimys was one shackled by Bubble himself! It was once an ancient wizard with powerful black magic... this is very bad news.

English: You are just as foolish as the clown... find his cache of power!
Traditional_Chinese: You are just as foolish as the clown... find his cache of power!

English: Find the Cache of Bubble.
Traditional_Chinese: Find the Cache of Bubble.

English: Envy Depths Part 2
Traditional_Chinese: Envy Depths Part 2

English: The Black Magician Returns
Traditional_Chinese: The Black Magician Returns

English: Throughout history the Black Magician has changed from person to person... the two best known are Great Magician Loala and the one you've just released... Lapranche.
Traditional_Chinese: Throughout history the Black Magician has changed from person to person... the two best known are Great Magician Loala and the one you've just released... Lapranche.

English: While Loala has stood down from her post as the Black Magician, Lapranche's mind was enslaved by Shade, and granted an incredible dark power...
Traditional_Chinese: While Loala has stood down from her post as the Black Magician, Lapranche's mind was enslaved by Shade, and granted an incredible dark power...

English: For a while we were safe with Lapranche sealed away by Bubble's magic, but Lapranche will surely send disasters our way to distract us while she builds her power back up.
Traditional_Chinese: 有一段時間我們很安全，因為拉普朗什被泡泡的魔法封鎖了，但拉普朗什肯定會在她恢復力量的同時給我們帶來災難來分散我們的注意力。

English: You should go speak to the Mayor of Darken City as quickly as possible to see if anything has been reported...
Traditional_Chinese: You should go speak to the Mayor of Darken City as quickly as possible to see if anything has been reported...

English: Check with the Mayor of Darken City and see if news of a disaster has been reported!
Traditional_Chinese: Check with the Mayor of Darken City and see if news of a disaster has been reported!

English: Whyyyy, why won't you help us? Are you secretly working with Shade!?
Traditional_Chinese: Whyyyy, why won't you help us? Are you secretly working with Shade!?

English: So Lapranche was released from her prison after all these years...
Traditional_Chinese: So Lapranche was released from her prison after all these years...

English: Go speak with the Mayor of Darken City!
Traditional_Chinese: Go speak with the Mayor of Darken City!

English: Report to the Mayor of Darken City.
Traditional_Chinese: Report to the Mayor of Darken City.

English: There's Something in the Water
Traditional_Chinese: There's Something in the Water

English: It was reported a few hours ago that a wall near where the Syliaca roam recently burst open, flooding the caves. Something this destructive has not happened in many years... I am certain this was caused by Lapranche's meddling.
Traditional_Chinese: It was reported a few hours ago that a wall near where the Syliaca roam recently burst open, flooding the caves. Something this destructive has not happened in many years... I am certain this was caused by Lapranche's meddling.

English: I wish to investigate the matter, but I have to attend to my duties here in the city.
Traditional_Chinese: I wish to investigate the matter, but I have to attend to my duties here in the city.

English: Collect enough samples of Syliaca to see if the flood has caused any mutations in their DNA.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect enough samples of Syliaca to see if the flood has caused any mutations in their DNA.

English: Without your help, who knows when I'll have time to investigate this matter...
Traditional_Chinese: Without your help, who knows when I'll have time to investigate this matter...

English: Fascinating! After analyzing the Syliaca samples it seems the water in the flood contains a magic component that affects the Syliaca's brain.
Traditional_Chinese: Fascinating! After analyzing the Syliaca samples it seems the water in the flood contains a magic component that affects the Syliaca's brain.

English: The hormones of these Syliaca seem to affect how aggressive they will become. And their teeth are somehow much sharper than before...
Traditional_Chinese: The hormones of these Syliaca seem to affect how aggressive they will become. And their teeth are somehow much sharper than before...

English: Collect 20 Syliaca DNA.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 20 Syliaca DNA.

English: The Hidden Cavern
Traditional_Chinese: The Hidden Cavern

English: If the water from the flood continues to affect the masquerpets in the Cave of Envy, soon they may become too strong for our forces to overcome. We must find the broken wall and see if a repair is possible.
Traditional_Chinese: If the water from the flood continues to affect the masquerpets in the Cave of Envy, soon they may become too strong for our forces to overcome. We must find the broken wall and see if a repair is possible.

English: The hole must be near the Syliaca... find it and determine if the damage is reparable.
Traditional_Chinese: The hole must be near the Syliaca... find it and determine if the damage is reparable.

English: If we leave the break in the walls of the Cave of Envy for too long, this situation will become an even bigger disaster.
Traditional_Chinese: If we leave the break in the walls of the Cave of Envy for too long, this situation will become an even bigger disaster.

English: So behind the wall seems to be a large, ornate cavern... What has Lapranche opened up to the world!?
Traditional_Chinese: So behind the wall seems to be a large, ornate cavern... What has Lapranche opened up to the world!?

English: Find the damaged wall in the Cave of Envy.
Traditional_Chinese: Find the damaged wall in the Cave of Envy.

English: Search for the damaged wall in the Cave of Envy.
Traditional_Chinese: Search for the damaged wall in the Cave of Envy.

English: Something Fishy
Traditional_Chinese: Something Fishy

English: Thank you for finding the break in the wall... I have sent a guard to prevent unsuspecting travelers from entering the cavern.
Traditional_Chinese: Thank you for finding the break in the wall... I have sent a guard to prevent unsuspecting travelers from entering the cavern.

English: I believe our next step will be to explore the cavern and see what Lapranche has unleashed upon us...
Traditional_Chinese: I believe our next step will be to explore the cavern and see what Lapranche has unleashed upon us...

English: Please travel back to the cavern and speak with the guard out front for your next assignment.
Traditional_Chinese: Please travel back to the cavern and speak with the guard out front for your next assignment.

English: Oh... is there another assignment you are tied up with already?
Traditional_Chinese: Oh... is there another assignment you are tied up with already?

English: Hello there, I was expecting you.
Traditional_Chinese: Hello there, I was expecting you.

English: Seek out the guard in front of the Envy Depths.
Traditional_Chinese: Seek out the guard in front of the Envy Depths.

English: Meet with the guard outside the Envy Depths.
Traditional_Chinese: Meet with the guard outside the Envy Depths.

English: Envy Depths Part 3
Traditional_Chinese: Envy Depths Part 3

English: Growing Gills
Traditional_Chinese: Growing Gills

English: After being assigned to my post here in the Cave of Envy, I've witnessed dozens of Syliaca enter the waters of the cavern behind me. If what the mayor said is true... those Syliaca may have grown into something much stronger by now. An investigation is in order.
Traditional_Chinese: After being assigned to my post here in the Cave of Envy, I've witnessed dozens of Syliaca enter the waters of the cavern behind me. If what the mayor said is true... those Syliaca may have grown into something much stronger by now. An investigation is in order.

English: Head inside the cavern behind me and find out what have happened to the Syliaca.
Traditional_Chinese: Head inside the cavern behind me and find out what have happened to the Syliaca.

English: You seem strong enough to handle a few empowered Syliaca... but maybe not.
Traditional_Chinese: You seem strong enough to handle a few empowered Syliaca... but maybe not.

English: Very interesting... so the Syliaca have turned into Overgrown Sharks after ingesting the cavern's magic waters. I am curious what else may be living within the cavern...
Traditional_Chinese: Very interesting... so the Syliaca have turned into Overgrown Sharks after ingesting the cavern's magic waters. I am curious what else may be living within the cavern...

English: Find out what have become of the Syliaca that entered the cavern.
Traditional_Chinese: Find out what have become of the Syliaca that entered the cavern.

English: Kill 25 Overgrown Shark.
Traditional_Chinese: Kill 25 Overgrown Shark.

English: Poor Unfortunate Souls
Traditional_Chinese: Poor Unfortunate Souls

English: With the Overgrown Sharks out of the way, you can find out what lies deeper within the cavern.
Traditional_Chinese: With the Overgrown Sharks out of the way, you can find out what lies deeper within the cavern.

English: Go back inside the cavern and seek out what caused the Cave of Envy to flood.
Traditional_Chinese: Go back inside the cavern and seek out what caused the Cave of Envy to flood.

English: Don't give up now, you've nearly figured out the secret to this cave.
Traditional_Chinese: Don't give up now, you've nearly figured out the secret to this cave.

English: It's incredible that life has been hidden here this whole time! It's a shame the Mermaid Beauties were so vicious. Likely influenced by the magical waters just as the Syliaca were.
Traditional_Chinese: It's incredible that life has been hidden here this whole time! It's a shame the Mermaid Beauties were so vicious. Likely influenced by the magical waters just as the Syliaca were.

English: Go deeper into the cavern.
Traditional_Chinese: Go deeper into the cavern.

English: Kill 25 Mermaid Beauty.
Traditional_Chinese: Kill 25 Mermaid Beauty.

English: Call of the Siren
Traditional_Chinese: Call of the Siren

English: I am curious if additional life lives within the cavern. Sadly whatever remains in the tainted waters has likely gone feral by now. More samples from the masquerpets within may reveal the true nature of what this place represents.
Traditional_Chinese: I am curious if additional life lives within the cavern. Sadly whatever remains in the tainted waters has likely gone feral by now. More samples from the masquerpets within may reveal the true nature of what this place represents.

English: Go back inside the cavern and collect samples from any masquerpets that remain.
Traditional_Chinese: Go back inside the cavern and collect samples from any masquerpets that remain.

English: There's no time to worry over what you may encounter... Trust in your own power.
Traditional_Chinese: There's no time to worry over what you may encounter... Trust in your own power.

English: Wow, these artifacts are pulsing with power! No normal being could handle something like this without becoming corrupted. It appears as if these artifacts have been present here for hundreds or thousands of years...
Traditional_Chinese: Wow, these artifacts are pulsing with power! No normal being could handle something like this without becoming corrupted. It appears as if these artifacts have been present here for hundreds or thousands of years...

English: Collect samples from any remaining masquerpets that are in the cavern.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect samples from any remaining masquerpets that are in the cavern.

English: Collect 20 Echo of Herness.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 20 Echo of Herness.

English: Davy Jones' Locker
Traditional_Chinese: Davy Jones' Locker

English: No wonder Lapranche released the powers hidden within the Envy Depths... She has certainly bought time to work towards her own goals while you deal with this.
Traditional_Chinese: No wonder Lapranche released the powers hidden within the Envy Depths... She has certainly bought time to work towards her own goals while you deal with this.

English: I believed the masquerpets that you gathered samples from were the last remaining creatures within the cavern... but certainly you hear the roar coming from within the cavern now?
Traditional_Chinese: I believed the masquerpets that you gathered samples from were the last remaining creatures within the cavern... but certainly you hear the roar coming from within the cavern now?

English: Only the roar of a mighty creature emanates the cavern now... Slay whatever beast is within. If you survive, deliver a report of your victory to the Mayor of Darken City.
Traditional_Chinese: Only the roar of a mighty creature emanates the cavern now... Slay whatever beast is within. If you survive, deliver a report of your victory to the Mayor of Darken City.

English: That roar is terrifying... steel your emotions and return to me when you are ready to find out what it is.
Traditional_Chinese: That roar is terrifying... steel your emotions and return to me when you are ready to find out what it is.

English: So all along the sealed chamber was an altar to an ancient being... I suppose the myths of the water god Herness may be more than a myth after all.
Traditional_Chinese: So all along the sealed chamber was an altar to an ancient being... I suppose the myths of the water god Herness may be more than a myth after all.

English: Well, with the Great Kraken defeated at least the danger that Lapranche brought to our feet has ended... for now.
Traditional_Chinese: Well, with the Great Kraken defeated at least the danger that Lapranche brought to our feet has ended... for now.

English: I congratulate you on making it out of there alive. Expect the repercussions of releasing Lapranche to be upon us one day though...
Traditional_Chinese: I congratulate you on making it out of there alive. Expect the repercussions of releasing Lapranche to be upon us one day though...

English: Head inside the Envy Depths and eliminate whatever is causing that awful noise.
Traditional_Chinese: Head inside the Envy Depths and eliminate whatever is causing that awful noise.

English: Kill the Great Kraken.
Traditional_Chinese: Kill the Great Kraken.

English: The Twisted Sanctuary Part 1
Traditional_Chinese: The Twisted Sanctuary Part 1

English: Bear's Endurance
Traditional_Chinese: Bear's Endurance

English: There has been a disturbance in the flow of Madrigal's magic lately... I've heard rumors that an unsuspecting adventurer released the Black Magician from their prison.
Traditional_Chinese: There has been a disturbance in the flow of Madrigal's magic lately... I've heard rumors that an unsuspecting adventurer released the Black Magician from their prison.

English: The current Black Magician named Lapranche is also sometimes known as the Purple Magician. She has an incredible power that is lost to all of today's magicians, including myself. Lapranche can summon the will of Shade to cast Purple Magic, recreating parts of the world in Shade's image.
Traditional_Chinese: 現任黑魔法師拉普朗雪有時也被稱為紫魔法師。 她擁有不可思議的力量，這是當今所有魔術師所不具備的，包括我自己。 拉普朗什可以召喚史瑞德的意志來施展紫色魔法，以史瑞德的形象重建世界的一部分。

English: As of now we stand no chance in a battle with Lapranche... even I have grown too weak to defeat her, my former pupil. She is certainly in a weakened state, so there is time to prepare. Expect Lapranche to bide her time by causing choas around Madrigal. For now we must build our strength.
Traditional_Chinese: As of now we stand no chance in a battle with Lapranche... even I have grown too weak to defeat her, my former pupil. She is certainly in a weakened state, so there is time to prepare. Expect Lapranche to bide her time by causing choas around Madrigal. For now we must build our strength.

English: Before we move forward with the plan... I need you to prove that you are strong enough to fend for yourself. Bring me 50 Bearnerky Fang, then we can move forward with preparations.
Traditional_Chinese: Before we move forward with the plan... I need you to prove that you are strong enough to fend for yourself. Bring me 50 Bearnerky Fang, then we can move forward with preparations.

English: If we are not prepared, Lapranche could unleash evil more terrible than us mortals could ever hope to face.
Traditional_Chinese: 如果我們沒有做好準備，拉普朗什可能會釋放出比我們凡人所希望面對的更可怕的邪惡。
