English: I hope you understand my hesitance... the power of Purple Magic is nothing to play with. We may start work on the plan now.
Traditional_Chinese: I hope you understand my hesitance... the power of Purple Magic is nothing to play with. We may start work on the plan now.

English: Go defeat Bearnerky until you have collected 50 Bearnerky Fang.
Traditional_Chinese: 去擊敗野熊王，直到你收集到 50 個野熊王獠牙。

English: Collect 50 Bearnerky Fang.
Traditional_Chinese: 收集 50 個野熊王獠牙。

English: Brother in Arms
Traditional_Chinese: Brother in Arms

English: There is no hope in standing against Lapranche on our own. We must build an army of warriors, ensuring each is equipped with the weapons and armor needed to succeed.
Traditional_Chinese: 靠我們自己對抗拉普朗什是沒有希望的。 我們必須建立一支戰士軍隊，確保每個人都配備成功所需的武器和盔甲。

English: In the Deadwallderness lives a smelter who has experience with unique requests. Tell Nein of our plan, and see what help he can offer.
Traditional_Chinese: In the Deadwallderness lives a smelter who has experience with unique requests. Tell Nein of our plan, and see what help he can offer.

English: *Scoff* What, will you smelt the materials for equipment all on your own?
Traditional_Chinese: *Scoff* What, will you smelt the materials for equipment all on your own?

English: So there's trouble... Well if Laola has sent you, I am much obliged to help if I can.
Traditional_Chinese: So there's trouble... Well if Laola has sent you, I am much obliged to help if I can.

English: Find Nein in the Deadwallderness, and see what he requires to help us equip an army.
Traditional_Chinese: Find Nein in the Deadwallderness, and see what he requires to help us equip an army.

English: Speak with Nein.
Traditional_Chinese: Speak with Nein.

English: Tough as Steel
Traditional_Chinese: Tough as Steel

English: Based on Laola's instructions, you'll need to help me gather enough metal scraps for a small army... That might take a while.
Traditional_Chinese: Based on Laola's instructions, you'll need to help me gather enough metal scraps for a small army... That might take a while.

English: To get started on the crafting materials for an army of armor, collect 200 of the Muffrin's metal buckets.
Traditional_Chinese: To get started on the crafting materials for an army of armor, collect 200 of the Muffrin's metal buckets.

English: Finding the right metals will be difficult on your own...
Traditional_Chinese: Finding the right metals will be difficult on your own...

English: Thank you for your efforts. I know gathering this much metal must have taken a toll on you.
Traditional_Chinese: Thank you for your efforts. I know gathering this much metal must have taken a toll on you.

English: Collect 200 buckets from the Muffrins that roam the Deadwallderness.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 200 buckets from the Muffrins that roam the Deadwallderness.

English: Collect 200 Muffrin Bucket.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 200 Muffrin Bucket.

English: High Quality Goods
Traditional_Chinese: High Quality Goods

English: Smelting all this metal down for use will take a while. You may want to find an armorsmith to determine what else will be needed until I finish my work.
Traditional_Chinese: Smelting all this metal down for use will take a while. You may want to find an armorsmith to determine what else will be needed until I finish my work.

English: Out in the Village of Kan there is a talented craftsman named Chenbing Khan who can guide you further.
Traditional_Chinese: 在坎村有一位天才工匠，名叫趁風可汗，他可以指導你進一步。

English: Well you could just wait here... but time is ticking, better to get other tasks out of the way.
Traditional_Chinese: Well you could just wait here... but time is ticking, better to get other tasks out of the way.

English: It's nice Nein thinks enough of me to send you my way. I run a humble armor shop here in my village, and know all the secrets of how to improve simple weapons into deadly munitions.
Traditional_Chinese: It's nice Nein thinks enough of me to send you my way. I run a humble armor shop here in my village, and know all the secrets of how to improve simple weapons into deadly munitions.

English: Go find Chenbing in the Village of Kan and give him a hand collecting crafting materials.
Traditional_Chinese: 去坎村找趁風，幫他收集製作材料。

English: Speak with Chenbing.
Traditional_Chinese: 跟趁風說話

English: The Twisted Sanctuary Part 2
Traditional_Chinese: The Twisted Sanctuary Part 2

English: Gotta Catch Them All
Traditional_Chinese: Gotta Catch Them All

English: We won't be able to craft any armor until Nein has completed smelting the Muffrin's buckets into something suitable. But once Nein is complete, we will need several materials only found from rare creatures known as Catchers.
Traditional_Chinese: We won't be able to craft any armor until Nein has completed smelting the Muffrin's buckets into something suitable. But once Nein is complete, we will need several materials only found from rare creatures known as Catchers.

English: Catchers can be found all over Madrigal, but luckily for you all the most common catchers appear in Darkon 3. Collect 500 of each Catcher's material, then head back to Nein to collect the smelted metal.
Traditional_Chinese: Catchers can be found all over Madrigal, but luckily for you all the most common catchers appear in Darkon 3. Collect 500 of each Catcher's material, then head back to Nein to collect the smelted metal.

English: Collecting materials from Catchers is quite simple... I have a book on how to gather them in my tent if you need a reference.
Traditional_Chinese: Collecting materials from Catchers is quite simple... I have a book on how to gather them in my tent if you need a reference.

English: Perfect timing! I just finished smelting down all the metal into something of use.
Traditional_Chinese: Perfect timing! I just finished smelting down all the metal into something of use.

English: Catchers are rare, but Darkon 3 has them all. Keep looking, and make sure to equip your Collector weapon to harvest a Catcher after you defeat it.
Traditional_Chinese: Catchers are rare, but Darkon 3 has them all. Keep looking, and make sure to equip your Collector weapon to harvest a Catcher after you defeat it.

English: Collect 500 Erons, Krasec, Mineral, and Guru.
Traditional_Chinese: 收集500個艾磷胚斯, 石花, 天然礦物,和鈷礫。

English: Crafting an Army
Traditional_Chinese: Crafting an Army

English: With the smelting complete, it's time to craft an army's worth of armor!
Traditional_Chinese: With the smelting complete, it's time to craft an army's worth of armor!

English: Alright, head back to Chenbing. Work with him to start crafting the armor we'll need to win the battle against Lapranche!
Traditional_Chinese: 好了，回到趁風身邊。 與他一起開始製作我們贏得與拉普朗什戰鬥所需的盔甲！

English: Crafting is tough work. It's not for everybody.
Traditional_Chinese: Crafting is tough work. It's not for everybody.

English: Well done, we have everything needed to bolster an army of adventurers against the Black Magician!
Traditional_Chinese: Well done, we have everything needed to bolster an army of adventurers against the Black Magician!

English: Head back to Chenbing to help craft armaments.
Traditional_Chinese: 回到趁風那裡幫助製造武器。

English: Meet with Chenbing.
Traditional_Chinese: 會見趁風。

English: A Loud Bang!
Traditional_Chinese: A Loud Bang!

English: Look at all this steel. We'll have an army up and running in no time!
Traditional_Chinese: Look at all this steel. We'll have an army up and running in no time!

English: *BANG* Wha... What was that!? Perhaps the battle has already begun? Quickly, go speak with Loala to figure out what is going on!
Traditional_Chinese: *BANG* Wha... What was that!? Perhaps the battle has already begun? Quickly, go speak with Loala to figure out what is going on!

English: Just a while longer and we'll have enough armor to equip a proper militia!
Traditional_Chinese: Just a while longer and we'll have enough armor to equip a proper militia!

English: Chenbing was smart to send you to me... surely you felt the tremors after that loud bang.
Traditional_Chinese: Chenbing was smart to send you to me... surely you felt the tremors after that loud bang.

English: Speak with Loala to find out what caused that loud noise.
Traditional_Chinese: Speak with Loala to find out what caused that loud noise.

English: Meet with Laola.
Traditional_Chinese: Meet with Laola.

English: Shot Through the Heart
Traditional_Chinese: Shot Through the Heart

English: A hole in the heart of the Guardiane Sanctuary has been torn asunder! Purple magic has ripped open a portal to a sad, twisted version of the once peaceful haven.
Traditional_Chinese: 守護者聖域的中心被撕裂了一個洞！ 紫色魔法撕開了通往曾經和平避風港的悲傷扭曲視線的門戶。

English: Reports show that all the inhabitants were killed and raised as bloodthirsty masquerpets... this is no doubt the doing of Lapranche. She is causing chaos to bide time, just as we expected!
Traditional_Chinese: Reports show that all the inhabitants were killed and raised as bloodthirsty masquerpets... this is no doubt the doing of Lapranche. She is causing chaos to bide time, just as we expected!

English: For now we must pause our preparations to deal with the twisted Guardiane Sanctuary.
Traditional_Chinese: 現在我們必須暫停我們的準備工作來處理扭曲的守護者聖域。

English: A guard has been posted out front of the portal... go speak with them. Prepare to clear out the Guardiane Sanctuary.
Traditional_Chinese: A guard has been posted out front of the portal... go speak with them. Prepare to clear out the Guardiane Sanctuary.

English: Are you really so weak as to run away from danger, after all you've done!?
Traditional_Chinese: Are you really so weak as to run away from danger, after all you've done!?

English: Laola sent word of your arrival. The events that Lapranche have put into place are tragic... all the inhabitants of the Guardiane Sanctuary are dead. And yet... they live.
Traditional_Chinese: Laola sent word of your arrival. The events that Lapranche have put into place are tragic... all the inhabitants of the Guardiane Sanctuary are dead. And yet... they live.

English: Go find the guard posted outside the Guardiane Sanctuary portal, in the heart of Guardiane.
Traditional_Chinese: 去守護者中心的守護者聖域門戶外找到守衛。

English: Speak with the Guardiane Sanctuary guard.
Traditional_Chinese: 與守護者聖域守衛交談。

English: The Twisted Sanctuary Part 3
Traditional_Chinese: The Twisted Sanctuary Part 3

English: A Potent Mist
Traditional_Chinese: A Potent Mist

English: A horde of the dead have arisen inside the sanctuary...
Traditional_Chinese: A horde of the dead have arisen inside the sanctuary...

English: Your first order of duty is to eliminate the dead and find any clues that may lead to Lapranche.
Traditional_Chinese: 你的首要任務是消滅死者並找到任何可能導致拉普朗什的線索。

English: Do not feel guilty for slaying the creatures inside. They are long dead now.
Traditional_Chinese: Do not feel guilty for slaying the creatures inside. They are long dead now.

English: Well done on clearing out the dead. Oh, and what's this? Interesting... a vial of purple mist. Could the mist be connected to the Purple Magic that Lapranche is said to practice?
Traditional_Chinese: Well done on clearing out the dead. Oh, and what's this? Interesting... a vial of purple mist. Could the mist be connected to the Purple Magic that Lapranche is said to practice?

English: Clear out the undead minions inside the sanctuary, and search for any clue that could help us find Lapranche.
Traditional_Chinese: 清除聖域內的亡靈爪牙，尋找任何能幫助我們找到拉普朗什的線索。

English: Kill 30 Regal Kumai, 30 Enchanted Rider, and find the Vial of Purple Mist.
Traditional_Chinese: 獵殺30個富豪熊井，30個魔法騎士並找到紫霧之瓶。

English: Purple Reign
Traditional_Chinese: Purple Reign

English: Often potent magic leaves behind a trail in its wake of destruction. If Purple Magic was used to destroy the Guardiane Sanctuary... the people inside that turned into those creatures may have a small essence of purple energy still hanging on.
Traditional_Chinese: Often potent magic leaves behind a trail in its wake of destruction. If Purple Magic was used to destroy the Guardiane Sanctuary... the people inside that turned into those creatures may have a small essence of purple energy still hanging on.

English: Return to the ruins of the Guardiane Sanctuary, and collect the purple essence left behind on the bodies of the creatures within.
Traditional_Chinese: 返回守護者聖域遺跡，收集留在裡面生物身上的紫色精華。

English: Little is known about the effects of Purple Magic on the body... a healthy fear of it may be for the best.
Traditional_Chinese: Little is known about the effects of Purple Magic on the body... a healthy fear of it may be for the best.

English: The evidence is clear... the only magician powerful enough to cast Purple Magic of this potency is the Purple Magician herself, Lapranche.
Traditional_Chinese: The evidence is clear... the only magician powerful enough to cast Purple Magic of this potency is the Purple Magician herself, Lapranche.

English: Destroy the Enchanted AI and Enchanted Shaman in the twisted Guardiane Sanctuary to obtain 20 Purple Essence.
Traditional_Chinese: 在扭曲的守護者聖域中摧毀魔法 AI 和魔法薩滿獲得 20 個紫色精華。

English: Collect 20 Purple Essence from Enchanted AI and Enchanted Shaman.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 20 Purple Essence from Enchanted AI and Enchanted Shaman.

English: Keeper of the Kingdom
Traditional_Chinese: Keeper of the Kingdom

English: Lapranche has certainly slowed down our efforts to build a force that can oppose her. It's likely that the previous Keeper of the Sanctuary was transformed like all the others...
Traditional_Chinese: Lapranche has certainly slowed down our efforts to build a force that can oppose her. It's likely that the previous Keeper of the Sanctuary was transformed like all the others...

English: The Keeper was a force to be reckoned with, the second in command of the protective force that guarded the Guardiane Sanctuary. If the Keeper still remains... it will be a formidable challenge.
Traditional_Chinese: The Keeper was a force to be reckoned with, the second in command of the protective force that guarded the Guardiane Sanctuary. If the Keeper still remains... it will be a formidable challenge.

English: You have already done so much to help uncover the truth of the Purple Magician's terrible crimes. Defeat the Keeper if you are able... and please, be careful.
Traditional_Chinese: You have already done so much to help uncover the truth of the Purple Magician's terrible crimes. Defeat the Keeper if you are able... and please, be careful.

English: The Keeper stood guard over the grounds of the Guardiane Sanctuary, and dealt with intruders abruptly. Defeating the Keeper is a challenge even you may not be ready to handle.
Traditional_Chinese: 守護者守衛著守護者聖域的地面，並突然對付入侵者。 擊敗守門員是一項挑戰，即使您可能還沒有準備好應對。

English: Your strength is nearly beyond belief... You are a true hero, down to the very core of who you are. The Pyramid Keeper was also a hero... and now a hero who can rest.
Traditional_Chinese: Your strength is nearly beyond belief... You are a true hero, down to the very core of who you are. The Pyramid Keeper was also a hero... and now a hero who can rest.

English: Carefully scout the grounds of the twisted Guardiane Sanctuary, and defeat whatever remains of the Pyramid Keeper.
Traditional_Chinese: 仔細偵察扭曲的守護者聖域的地面，並擊敗金字塔守護者的任何殘餘。

English: Destroy the Pyramid Keeper.
Traditional_Chinese: 摧毀金字塔守護者。

English: Raiders of the Lost Sanctuary
Traditional_Chinese: Raiders of the Lost Sanctuary

English: Lapranche has twisted this once peaceful haven into the distorted Guardiane Sanctuary that you see before you. Your strength has carried you to do deeds that many others would be unable to stomach.
Traditional_Chinese: 拉普朗什將這個曾經寧靜的避風港扭曲成您眼前扭曲的守護聖域。你的力量使你做出了許多其他人無法忍受的事情。

English: With great honor, you have put to rest those cursed by the power of the Purple Magician. In eternal rest, Shade's curse can no longer harm them.
Traditional_Chinese: With great honor, you have put to rest those cursed by the power of the Purple Magician. In eternal rest, Shade's curse can no longer harm them.

English: Within the walls of the Guardiane Sanctuary, there was one guardian that acted as the last defense against evil that dared to approach. In hundreds of years of service, the Pyramid Guardian never faced defeat... until now.
Traditional_Chinese: Within the walls of the Guardiane Sanctuary, there was one guardian that acted as the last defense against evil that dared to approach. In hundreds of years of service, the Pyramid Guardian never faced defeat... until now.

English: The last bastion of Guardiane stands within the deformed heart before you. Its tattered muscles move to protect the twisted realm, though no life remains behind its eyes.
Traditional_Chinese: The last bastion of Guardiane stands within the deformed heart before you. Its tattered muscles move to protect the twisted realm, though no life remains behind its eyes.

English: This barbaric curse sickens me... Put the Pyramid Guardian to rest, then report back to Laola.
Traditional_Chinese: This barbaric curse sickens me... Put the Pyramid Guardian to rest, then report back to Laola.

English: For all but the Purple Magician... little hope may remain for those who enter into a battle with such a powerful warrior.
Traditional_Chinese: For all but the Purple Magician... little hope may remain for those who enter into a battle with such a powerful warrior.

English: So it is done... thank you for laying to rest those cursed by the Purple Magician. It's selfish, but I truly do not wish harm upon Lapranche, only for her to be free from Shade's curse...
Traditional_Chinese: So it is done... thank you for laying to rest those cursed by the Purple Magician. It's selfish, but I truly do not wish harm upon Lapranche, only for her to be free from Shade's curse...

English: I intend to find a way to stop Lapranche without destroying her entirely... but in the end, we have no choice but to stop her now.
Traditional_Chinese: I intend to find a way to stop Lapranche without destroying her entirely... but in the end, we have no choice but to stop her now.

English: Guardiane needs time to heal, but soon we will speak again about the plan at hand. The army of Madrigal will rise again to defeat Shade and her puppet Lapranche.
Traditional_Chinese: 守護者需要時間來療傷，但很快我們將再次討論手頭的計劃。 瑪德利賈的軍隊將再次崛起，以擊敗史瑞德和她的傀儡拉普朗什。

English: Seek out what remains of the Pyramid Guardian, and put it to rest.
Traditional_Chinese: Seek out what remains of the Pyramid Guardian, and put it to rest.

English: Destroy the Pyramid Guardian.
Traditional_Chinese: Destroy the Pyramid Guardian.

English: A New Weapon Part 1
Traditional_Chinese: A New Weapon Part 1

English: Rankashu's Request
Traditional_Chinese: 小草兒的需求

English: I don't know why I am telling you this... but sometimes I think back to the mighty beast Clockworks that us Dwarpets built to protect Madrigal long ago.
Traditional_Chinese: I don't know why I am telling you this... but sometimes I think back to the mighty beast Clockworks that us Dwarpets built to protect Madrigal long ago.

English: You are a powerful warrior... you may have even fought Clockworks at its prison in Darken City. But did you know Clockworks was once used to defend all life from the evils of the Goddess Shade? Shade corrupted our creation, turning the Clockworks against the world for her own desires.
Traditional_Chinese: You are a powerful warrior... you may have even fought Clockworks at its prison in Darken City. But did you know Clockworks was once used to defend all life from the evils of the Goddess Shade? Shade corrupted our creation, turning the Clockworks against the world for her own desires.

English: My family is long gone now... but they always told tales about how Clockworks was built from mechanical parts formed in the mines around Madrigal.
Traditional_Chinese: My family is long gone now... but they always told tales about how Clockworks was built from mechanical parts formed in the mines around Madrigal.

English: It's a long shot, but I want to try and seek out any lost parts from back then that may have been left behind in the mines. I haven't been successful in finding anything during my stay here at the Dekane Mine, but I've heard there is a mine deep in the mountains of Azria...
Traditional_Chinese: It's a long shot, but I want to try and seek out any lost parts from back then that may have been left behind in the mines. I haven't been successful in finding anything during my stay here at the Dekane Mine, but I've heard there is a mine deep in the mountains of Azria...

English: I think there may be lost technology hidden in the Azria Mine that may allow us to create something that could one day rid the world of Shade's cursed creatures, the masquerpets.
Traditional_Chinese: I think there may be lost technology hidden in the Azria Mine that may allow us to create something that could one day rid the world of Shade's cursed creatures, the masquerpets.

English: Would you go find someone in Azria who may know more about the mine hidden in the mountains?
Traditional_Chinese: Would you go find someone in Azria who may know more about the mine hidden in the mountains?

English: Thank you for helping me... it's rare that I work with humans who are so willing. Please go to the Azria Village and find someone who knows about the Azria Mine.
Traditional_Chinese: Thank you for helping me... it's rare that I work with humans who are so willing. Please go to the Azria Village and find someone who knows about the Azria Mine.

English: I'm not surprised... humans were never good to us Dwarpets anyway.
Traditional_Chinese: I'm not surprised... humans were never good to us Dwarpets anyway.

English: Hello warrior, so you want to know more about the mines here in Azria?
Traditional_Chinese: Hello warrior, so you want to know more about the mines here in Azria?

English: Speak to someone in Azria Village who knows about the Azria Mine.
Traditional_Chinese: Speak to someone in Azria Village who knows about the Azria Mine.

English: Find and speak with Mawrang in Azria Village.
Traditional_Chinese: Find and speak with Mawrang in Azria Village.

English: Fresh Mountain Air
Traditional_Chinese: Fresh Mountain Air

English: For many years the mine that sits atop the Azria mountains was run by a group of Dwarpets. The export of crystals from the mine allowed us to build this village in the first place, long long ago.
Traditional_Chinese: For many years the mine that sits atop the Azria mountains was run by a group of Dwarpets. The export of crystals from the mine allowed us to build this village in the first place, long long ago.

English: Not only did the crystals help defend Azria Village from the monsters outside these walls, but they were once used to give life to a mechanical beast that the Dwarpets used to fight against Shade's army.
Traditional_Chinese: Not only did the crystals help defend Azria Village from the monsters outside these walls, but they were once used to give life to a mechanical beast that the Dwarpets used to fight against Shade's army.

English: Rankashu probably wonders what is left of the mine's powerful crystals, and what may have been left behind by his people...
Traditional_Chinese: Rankashu probably wonders what is left of the mine's powerful crystals, and what may have been left behind by his people...

English: There is a guard outside the entrance to the Storm Peak where the Azria Mine is located, let him know that Mawrang has sent you and he may allow you to step inside the mine to search for clues.
Traditional_Chinese: There is a guard outside the entrance to the Storm Peak where the Azria Mine is located, let him know that Mawrang has sent you and he may allow you to step inside the mine to search for clues.

English: Those are do not seek knowledge may never know true wisdom...
Traditional_Chinese: Those are do not seek knowledge may never know true wisdom...

English: Oh hello, it's rare to see visitors way up here. I see, so Mawrang sent you to investigate the mine.
Traditional_Chinese: Oh hello, it's rare to see visitors way up here. I see, so Mawrang sent you to investigate the mine.

English: Find the Storm Peak Guard.
Traditional_Chinese: Find the Storm Peak Guard.

English: Speak to the Storm Peak Guard.
Traditional_Chinese: Speak to the Storm Peak Guard.

English: Winter is Coming
Traditional_Chinese: Winter is Coming

English: Storm Peak mountain has been closed off for many years... I am stationed here to prevent anyone from going inside. Terrifying masquerpets have overrun the place, and as far as I know no one has been able to safely step inside for a long time.
Traditional_Chinese: Storm Peak mountain has been closed off for many years... I am stationed here to prevent anyone from going inside. Terrifying masquerpets have overrun the place, and as far as I know no one has been able to safely step inside for a long time.

English: If you really want to go inside, you'll need to prove that you can handle the strongest masquerpets in Azria. Those found within the Storm Peak are even more dangerous...
Traditional_Chinese: If you really want to go inside, you'll need to prove that you can handle the strongest masquerpets in Azria. Those found within the Storm Peak are even more dangerous...

English: Eliminate 200 Mammoth to prove that you can handle the dangers within the Storm Peak.
Traditional_Chinese: Eliminate 200 Mammoth to prove that you can handle the dangers within the Storm Peak.

English: The Storm Peak mine is too dangerous anyway...
Traditional_Chinese: The Storm Peak mine is too dangerous anyway...

English: You actually managed to kill that many Mammoths!? Well if that is the case... I think it's time to let you test your fate inside the Storm Peak mountain.
Traditional_Chinese: You actually managed to kill that many Mammoths!? Well if that is the case... I think it's time to let you test your fate inside the Storm Peak mountain.

English: Eliminate 200 Mammoths as proof of your strength.
Traditional_Chinese: Eliminate 200 Mammoths as proof of your strength.

English: Kill 200 Mammoths.
Traditional_Chinese: Kill 200 Mammoths.

English: Lost Kin
Traditional_Chinese: Lost Kin

English: I wish you the best on your journey, however just know that the Storm Peak is terrifying. Only step foot within if you are truly prepared.
Traditional_Chinese: I wish you the best on your journey, however just know that the Storm Peak is terrifying. Only step foot within if you are truly prepared.

English: Many dangers lie ahead... but I trust you to take them head on and emerge victorious, warrior. Enter the Storm Peak and find out what lies ahead.
Traditional_Chinese: Many dangers lie ahead... but I trust you to take them head on and emerge victorious, warrior. Enter the Storm Peak and find out what lies ahead.

English: It is not too late to turn back, entering the Storm Peak is almost certain death.
Traditional_Chinese: It is not too late to turn back, entering the Storm Peak is almost certain death.

English: Heh!? What is one of your kind doing here? I haven't seen any living creatures other than these puppets of Shade for years now...
Traditional_Chinese: Heh!? What is one of your kind doing here? I haven't seen any living creatures other than these puppets of Shade for years now...

English: Head inside the Storm Peak when you are ready.
Traditional_Chinese: Head inside the Storm Peak when you are ready.

English: Speak with Rankashin.
Traditional_Chinese: 與森林守衛者交談

English: A New Weapon Part 2
Traditional_Chinese: A New Weapon Part 2

English: A Harey Situation
Traditional_Chinese: A Harey Situation

English: So a Dwarpet named Rankashu sent you to look for scraps that could be used to build another weapon... interesting. I have lived my life reflecting on the effects of the last time the Dwarpets made a weapon... the Clockworks.
Traditional_Chinese: So a Dwarpet named Rankashu sent you to look for scraps that could be used to build another weapon... interesting. I have lived my life reflecting on the effects of the last time the Dwarpets made a weapon... the Clockworks.

English: Creating the Clockworks weapon brought Madrigal salvation... until Shade turned our weapon against us. The Clockworks rampaged throughout the lands, destroying villages and the people who lived in them. Clockworks was eventually contained... but is no longer a threat to Shade.
Traditional_Chinese: Creating the Clockworks weapon brought Madrigal salvation... until Shade turned our weapon against us. The Clockworks rampaged throughout the lands, destroying villages and the people who lived in them. Clockworks was eventually contained... but is no longer a threat to Shade.

English: All the other Dwarpets have long died or left the Storm Peak... but perhaps with your help, we can gather materials to build a new weapon to stop Shade once and for all.
Traditional_Chinese: All the other Dwarpets have long died or left the Storm Peak... but perhaps with your help, we can gather materials to build a new weapon to stop Shade once and for all.

English: Frozen Hare Guards have completely blocked off the path leading deeper within the mountains. If you can take down their leader we can make a foothold further ahead.
Traditional_Chinese: Frozen Hare Guards have completely blocked off the path leading deeper within the mountains. If you can take down their leader we can make a foothold further ahead.

English: You were my one hope of continuing work on a new weapon... please reconsider.
Traditional_Chinese: You were my one hope of continuing work on a new weapon... please reconsider.

English: Well done! With the Frozen Hare Assassin out of the way we can continue to explore.
Traditional_Chinese: Well done! With the Frozen Hare Assassin out of the way we can continue to explore.

English: Eliminate 30 Frozen Hare Guards and their leader, the Frozen Hare Assassin.
Traditional_Chinese: Eliminate 30 Frozen Hare Guards and their leader, the Frozen Hare Assassin.

English: Kill 30 Frozen Hare Guard and 1 Frozen Hare Assassin.
Traditional_Chinese: Kill 30 Frozen Hare Guard and 1 Frozen Hare Assassin.

English: Building a Weapon
Traditional_Chinese: Building a Weapon

English: With the guards out of our hair we can start collecting supplies to start building a brand new weapon!
Traditional_Chinese: With the guards out of our hair we can start collecting supplies to start building a brand new weapon!

English: The Enraged Yetti and Saphyryan Hounds that live in the valley below have weapons and armor we can use to forge the basis of a mechanical beast like Clockworks.
Traditional_Chinese: The Enraged Yetti and Saphyryan Hounds that live in the valley below have weapons and armor we can use to forge the basis of a mechanical beast like Clockworks.

English: Head down to the valley and collect Yetti Hammers and Hound Harnesses, they'll come in handy for crafting...
Traditional_Chinese: Head down to the valley and collect Yetti Hammers and Hound Harnesses, they'll come in handy for crafting...

English: The hounds only bite a little bit...
Traditional_Chinese: The hounds only bite a little bit...

English: Yes, this will do nicely! I can start forging a new Clockworks with these materials. But there's one thing we're missing...
Traditional_Chinese: Yes, this will do nicely! I can start forging a new Clockworks with these materials. But there's one thing we're missing...

English: Collect Yetti Hammers and Hound Harnesses from the masquerpets in the valley below.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect Yetti Hammers and Hound Harnesses from the masquerpets in the valley below.

English: Collect 30 Yetti Hammers from the Enraged Yetti, and 15 Hound Harness from the Saphyryan Hounds.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect 30 Yetti Hammers from the Enraged Yetti, and 15 Hound Harness from the Saphyryan Hounds.

English: Army of the Dead
Traditional_Chinese: Army of the Dead

English: These armaments are a good foundation to work off of for now... but to bring a new Clockworks to life, we need a powerful core of energy.
Traditional_Chinese: These armaments are a good foundation to work off of for now... but to bring a new Clockworks to life, we need a powerful core of energy.

English: When the masquerpets invaded Storm Peak, the Crystal Demon Lord led an army of undead deep within the mountains and sealed away the last known energy core produced by my people...
Traditional_Chinese: When the masquerpets invaded Storm Peak, the Crystal Demon Lord led an army of undead deep within the mountains and sealed away the last known energy core produced by my people...

English: The Demon Lord hides behind its skeletal minions, so to even have a chance at retriving the energy core we will need to eliminate the Skeletal Militants along with the Skeleton General.
Traditional_Chinese: The Demon Lord hides behind its skeletal minions, so to even have a chance at retriving the energy core we will need to eliminate the Skeletal Militants along with the Skeleton General.

English: The Skeletal Militants are formidable foes. The Skeleton General is said to use sharp blades affixed to its back to rip through anything that gets in its way.
Traditional_Chinese: 骷髏武裝分子是可怕的敵人。 據說骷髏將軍會使用固定在背部的鋒利刀片來撕裂任何擋道的東西。

English: There's no way we can get to the Demon Lord without first killing its minions...
Traditional_Chinese: There's no way we can get to the Demon Lord without first killing its minions...

English: Your power is tremendous! With your help I have made more progress in creating a new Clockworks than I have in my years out here on my own.
Traditional_Chinese: Your power is tremendous! With your help I have made more progress in creating a new Clockworks than I have in my years out here on my own.

English: You couldn't find the Skeletal Militants and their general? Head to the valley far below.
Traditional_Chinese: You couldn't find the Skeletal Militants and their general? Head to the valley far below.

English: Kill 80 Skeletal Militants and the Skeleton General.
Traditional_Chinese: Kill 80 Skeletal Militants and the Skeleton General.

English: Weapon of the Future
Traditional_Chinese: Weapon of the Future

English: The dream of building a new weapon to defend Madgrial is starting to feel real. The only thing standing in our way is the Crystal Demon Lord.
Traditional_Chinese: The dream of building a new weapon to defend Madgrial is starting to feel real. The only thing standing in our way is the Crystal Demon Lord.

English: Go collect the Clockworks Core that the Crystal Demon Lord has been guarding all these years. Once you've collected the Clockworks Core, I'm sure that Rankashu would appreciate an update on your progress...
Traditional_Chinese: Go collect the Clockworks Core that the Crystal Demon Lord has been guarding all these years. Once you've collected the Clockworks Core, I'm sure that Rankashu would appreciate an update on your progress...

English: Without the Clockworks Core there is no hope to build a new weapon.
Traditional_Chinese: Without the Clockworks Core there is no hope to build a new weapon.

English: This is incredible!!! My kin was in Storm Peak all along... and a Clockworks Core was being guarded there, too!? Perhaps the future of Madrigal is brighter than I thought...
Traditional_Chinese: This is incredible!!! My kin was in Storm Peak all along... and a Clockworks Core was being guarded there, too!? Perhaps the future of Madrigal is brighter than I thought...

English: I will spend my days trying to understand this Clockworks Core, perhaps one day Rankashin and I will successfully create the strongest Clockworks of all time!
Traditional_Chinese: 我會花很多時間去理解這個時空毀滅者核心，也許有一天我和森林守衛者會成功地創造出有史以來最強大的時空毀滅者！

English: Destroy the Crystal Demon Lord so I may finally bring a new Clockworks into the world!
Traditional_Chinese: Destroy the Crystal Demon Lord so I may finally bring a new Clockworks into the world!

English: Defeat the Crystal Demon Lord to obtain the Clockworks Core, then return to Rankashu in Darkon.
Traditional_Chinese: 擊敗水晶惡魔領主獲得時空毀滅者核心，然後返回達肯的小草兒。

English: Hael's Swords
Traditional_Chinese: Hael's Swords

English: Altars of a Dark Clown
Traditional_Chinese: Altars of a Dark Clown

English: Hidden within the walls of the Mars Mine are altars decorated with the symbol of the evil clown goddess, Shade.
Traditional_Chinese: Hidden within the walls of the Mars Mine are altars decorated with the symbol of the evil clown goddess, Shade.

English: Go visit the mine and see what I mean. The altars all have the symbol of Shade's corruption scattered nearby.
Traditional_Chinese: Go visit the mine and see what I mean. The altars all have the symbol of Shade's corruption scattered nearby.

English: Your curiosity will not go unpunished... to reveal the nature of Shade's power, you must defeat her elite guards within the Mars Mine.
Traditional_Chinese: Your curiosity will not go unpunished... to reveal the nature of Shade's power, you must defeat her elite guards within the Mars Mine.

English: Perhaps this is where your story ends...
Traditional_Chinese: Perhaps this is where your story ends...

English: Ah, I can tell you were successful in slaying Shade's elite guards. You're covered in her corrupted energy.
Traditional_Chinese: Ah, I can tell you were successful in slaying Shade's elite guards. You're covered in her corrupted energy.

English: Being in contact with this much purple magic has been known to cause memory loss... perhaps someone with knowledge of these magics could help you before you go mad.
Traditional_Chinese: Being in contact with this much purple magic has been known to cause memory loss... perhaps someone with knowledge of these magics could help you before you go mad.

English: Find and eliminate Shade's elite henchmen within the Mars Mine.
Traditional_Chinese: Find and eliminate Shade's elite henchmen within the Mars Mine.

English: Kill the elite masquerpets upon each of their altars within the Mars Mine.
Traditional_Chinese: Kill the elite masquerpets upon each of their altars within the Mars Mine.

English: A Reunion to Remember
Traditional_Chinese: A Reunion to Remember

English: Oh you've returned... at least I think I remember you.
Traditional_Chinese: Oh you've returned... at least I think I remember you.

English: You brought me something? Oh, it's a drink... I shouldn't trust you, but for some reason I don't sense any animosity in your aura. I'll take a drink in honor of our reunion today.
Traditional_Chinese: You brought me something? Oh, it's a drink... I shouldn't trust you, but for some reason I don't sense any animosity in your aura. I'll take a drink in honor of our reunion today.

English: Well it was nice to see you again...
Traditional_Chinese: Well it was nice to see you again...

English: It's all coming back, all the years. A lifetime of adventures are now clear... thanks to you.
Traditional_Chinese: It's all coming back, all the years. A lifetime of adventures are now clear... thanks to you.

English: Though I can never repay you for restoring my memories, I hope this gift will show my appreciation. Here, take my blades...
Traditional_Chinese: 雖然我永遠無法報答你讓我恢復了記憶，但我希望這份禮物能表達我的謝意。 來，拿走我的刀片…

English: Don't worry about me, hero. With my memories in tact again, I can finally fight back against the one who took my mind...
Traditional_Chinese: Don't worry about me, hero. With my memories in tact again, I can finally fight back against the one who took my mind...

English: Will you let me sip from the cup again?
Traditional_Chinese: Will you let me sip from the cup again?

English: Help restore Hael's memories.
Traditional_Chinese: Help restore Hael's memories.

English: King of Beasts
Traditional_Chinese: King of Beasts

English: Venomous Vendetta
Traditional_Chinese: Venomous Vendetta

English: Have you heard of the legendary King of the Beasts? Brace yourself, adventurer, for he is not one to be easily defeated.
Traditional_Chinese: Have you heard of the legendary King of the Beasts? Brace yourself, adventurer, for he is not one to be easily defeated.

English: Before you can even set foot in the presence of the King, you must navigate through a winding path teeming with a vicious monsters.
Traditional_Chinese: Before you can even set foot in the presence of the King, you must navigate through a winding path teeming with a vicious monsters.

English: Venture forth and cleanse The Wilds of the fearsome cobras and their master, the Twinstrike Den Mother. Clearing an opening will grant you the breathing space needed to strategize and prepare for what's to come.
Traditional_Chinese: Venture forth and cleanse The Wilds of the fearsome cobras and their master, the Twinstrike Den Mother. Clearing an opening will grant you the breathing space needed to strategize and prepare for what's to come.

English: Should a mere handful of these snakes cast doubt upon your resolve, the prospect of facing Beast King Khan becomes a distant dream!
Traditional_Chinese: Should a mere handful of these snakes cast doubt upon your resolve, the prospect of facing Beast King Khan becomes a distant dream!

English: With the serpents vanquished, your valor shines brightly, hero. Savor a brief rest, but keep your mind sharp, for another battle awaits when you re-enter the untamed Wilds!
Traditional_Chinese: With the serpents vanquished, your valor shines brightly, hero. Savor a brief rest, but keep your mind sharp, for another battle awaits when you re-enter the untamed Wilds!

English: Stay focused, adventurer. Venture back to the Wilds, and press on until the Prismatic Cobras and Twinstrike Den Mother are no more.
Traditional_Chinese: Stay focused, adventurer. Venture back to the Wilds, and press on until the Prismatic Cobras and Twinstrike Den Mother are no more.

English: Defeat 60 Prismatic Cobra, the Twinstrike Den Mother, then 60 Twinstrike Cobra.
Traditional_Chinese: Defeat 60 Prismatic Cobra, the Twinstrike Den Mother, then 60 Twinstrike Cobra.

English: Tale of Tanuki
Traditional_Chinese: Tale of Tanuki

English: The fight through the Wilds has only just begun. Armed with your newfound experience in the Wilds, you're ready to confront something even more perilous.
Traditional_Chinese: The fight through the Wilds has only just begun. Armed with your newfound experience in the Wilds, you're ready to confront something even more perilous.

English: Return to the Wilds and face the army of Tanuki warriors who stand as guardians of the King's lush garden.
Traditional_Chinese: Return to the Wilds and face the army of Tanuki warriors who stand as guardians of the King's lush garden.

English: The last fight certainly tested your mettle. Rest for a while, and let me know when you are ready to proceed.
Traditional_Chinese: The last fight certainly tested your mettle. Rest for a while, and let me know when you are ready to proceed.

English: The King's army has begun to dwindle! Only the most powerful of his guardians remain to defend him.
Traditional_Chinese: The King's army has begun to dwindle! Only the most powerful of his guardians remain to defend him.

English: You're so close to victory adventurer, do not give up hope. Defeat the Tanuki, and march ever closer to the King's chambers.
Traditional_Chinese: You're so close to victory adventurer, do not give up hope. Defeat the Tanuki, and march ever closer to the King's chambers.

English: Defeat 60 Tanuki Enforcer and the Tanuki Protector.
Traditional_Chinese: Defeat 60 Tanuki Enforcer and the Tanuki Protector.

English: Defying the Mystic Monarch
Traditional_Chinese: Defying the Mystic Monarch

English: The time has come to face King Beast Khan's most powerful allies!
Traditional_Chinese: The time has come to face King Beast Khan's most powerful allies!

English: Deep within the camp of the Wildwoods dwells a potent species of beast known as the Wildwood Stalkers. They are lead by the mysterious Wildwood Shaman, a being believed to imbue them with corrupted magics.
Traditional_Chinese: Deep within the camp of the Wildwoods dwells a potent species of beast known as the Wildwood Stalkers. They are lead by the mysterious Wildwood Shaman, a being believed to imbue them with corrupted magics.

English: To challenge the Wildwood without being thoroughly prepared would be a grave mistake.
Traditional_Chinese: To challenge the Wildwood without being thoroughly prepared would be a grave mistake.

English: The Wildwood have truly fallen!? Well done, hero! Only the King now stands in your path!
Traditional_Chinese: The Wildwood have truly fallen!? Well done, hero! Only the King now stands in your path!

English: The Wildwood are a fearsome species. Persevere, and keep pressing forward!
Traditional_Chinese: The Wildwood are a fearsome species. Persevere, and keep pressing forward!

English: Defeat 60 Wildwood Stalker and the Wildwood Shaman.
Traditional_Chinese: Defeat 60 Wildwood Stalker and the Wildwood Shaman.

English: Conquering the King
Traditional_Chinese: Conquering the King

English: Beast King Khan, the sovereign of the Wilds, holds dominion over all the untamed creatures dwelling within its depths. His fury befalls any who dare venture too close to his inner sanctum.
Traditional_Chinese: Beast King Khan, the sovereign of the Wilds, holds dominion over all the untamed creatures dwelling within its depths. His fury befalls any who dare venture too close to his inner sanctum.

English: Legend speaks of the King's chambers as housing extraordinary treasures, granting those who uncover them unparalleled power. Are you prepared to test the truth of these legends?
Traditional_Chinese: Legend speaks of the King's chambers as housing extraordinary treasures, granting those who uncover them unparalleled power. Are you prepared to test the truth of these legends?

English: Your time has come to confront the King, hero. Stand against the mighty King Beast Khan, and collect the spoils of your brave endeavors!
Traditional_Chinese: Your time has come to confront the King, hero. Stand against the mighty King Beast Khan, and collect the spoils of your brave endeavors!

English: Take all the time you require to make your preparations. The Beast King will surely remain within.
Traditional_Chinese: Take all the time you require to make your preparations. The Beast King will surely remain within.

English: Astounding, hero! You've vanquished the very King of Beasts himself!
Traditional_Chinese: Astounding, hero! You've vanquished the very King of Beasts himself!

English: Return to me if you emerge victorious against Beast King Khan.
Traditional_Chinese: Return to me if you emerge victorious against Beast King Khan.

English: Collect the Oversized Heart from Beast King Khan.
Traditional_Chinese: Collect the Oversized Heart from Beast King Khan.

English: Flyff's 20 year anniversary
Traditional_Chinese: Flyff's 20 year anniversary

English: The Beginnings
Traditional_Chinese: The Beginnings

English: Happy 20 year anniversary! Why don't you let me take you on a leisurely trip through a little history in celebration? As a reward, my mayor friends and I will reward you with a special glow.
Traditional_Chinese: Happy 20 year anniversary! Why don't you let me take you on a leisurely trip through a little history in celebration? As a reward, my mayor friends and I will reward you with a special glow.

English: The rest of the city mayors and I will guide you through some iconic Flyff experiences, and tell you about some milestones.
Traditional_Chinese: The rest of the city mayors and I will guide you through some iconic Flyff experiences, and tell you about some milestones.

English: The first and biggest milestone this 20 year old game hit was the grand opening, this month 20 years ago in Japan!
Traditional_Chinese: The first and biggest milestone this 20 year old game hit was the grand opening, this month 20 years ago in Japan!

English: As you might expect, the world of Madrigal looked quite different at that time... I was still a newly elected mayor! My only friends were the mayors of Saint City and Darken back then.
Traditional_Chinese: As you might expect, the world of Madrigal looked quite different at that time... I was still a newly elected mayor! My only friends were the mayors of Saint City and Darken back then.

English: You know, the only continents that were formed at that time were Flaris, Saint Morning, The Garden of Rhisis, and Darkon 1. If you'd like to see some pictures, check out the article on our website.
Traditional_Chinese: You know, the only continents that were formed at that time were Flaris, Saint Morning, The Garden of Rhisis, and Darkon 1. If you'd like to see some pictures, check out the article on our website.

English: Now, why don't you go kill some Aibatts for old time's sake and come back to me?
Traditional_Chinese: Now, why don't you go kill some Aibatts for old time's sake and come back to me?

English: I'll be waiting!
Traditional_Chinese: I'll be waiting!

English: Well, that's a shame. Happy anniversary anyway!
Traditional_Chinese: Well, that's a shame. Happy anniversary anyway!

English: Nice! This is nostalgic... It's been a while since I've seen an Aibatt kill mission.
Traditional_Chinese: Nice! This is nostalgic... It's been a while since I've seen an Aibatt kill mission.

English: Go ahead and meet with the mayor of Saint City. He's a great storyteller.
Traditional_Chinese: Go ahead and meet with the mayor of Saint City. He's a great storyteller.

English: Kill the Aibatts the mayor of Flarine told you about.
Traditional_Chinese: Kill the Aibatts the mayor of Flarine told you about.

English: Hello there. My friend in Flarine said you'd be coming. Now... where was the story?
Traditional_Chinese: Hello there. My friend in Flarine said you'd be coming. Now... where was the story?

English: Right. You just killed some Aibatts, and while that's something everyone is familiar with, there are some experiences that the veterans only know about.
Traditional_Chinese: Right. You just killed some Aibatts, and while that's something everyone is familiar with, there are some experiences that the veterans only know about.

English: Were you around when you had to level your skills by using them?! Yep, different world back then.
Traditional_Chinese: Were you around when you had to level your skills by using them?! Yep, different world back then.

English: Have you ever had to repair your weapon? Until the 9th version of Flyff, players like yourself had to repair their weapons over time...
Traditional_Chinese: Have you ever had to repair your weapon? Until the 9th version of Flyff, players like yourself had to repair their weapons over time...

English: As a matter of fact... I happen to have an 18 year old relic of mine which I never got to repair! My friend Bulrox used to love these things. Why don't you give it to him for me, as an Anniversary gift?
Traditional_Chinese: As a matter of fact... I happen to have an 18 year old relic of mine which I never got to repair! My friend Bulrox used to love these things. Why don't you give it to him for me, as an Anniversary gift?

English: I hope he still has the equipment to repair it, it's a sentimental piece... After you give it to Bulrox, the mayor of Darken will have some more to tell you.
Traditional_Chinese: I hope he still has the equipment to repair it, it's a sentimental piece... After you give it to Bulrox, the mayor of Darken will have some more to tell you.

English: Ah. He probably doesn't have the equipment for it anymore anyway.
Traditional_Chinese: Ah. He probably doesn't have the equipment for it anymore anyway.

English: Wow! I never thought I'd see one of these in this condition again! This is an incredible gift for a weapons' master, I'll be spending all my time off work fixing this.
Traditional_Chinese: Wow! I never thought I'd see one of these in this condition again! This is an incredible gift for a weapons' master, I'll be spending all my time off work fixing this.

English: Deliver the broken Wooden Sword to Bulrox, as a gift from the mayor.
Traditional_Chinese: Deliver the broken Wooden Sword to Bulrox, as a gift from the mayor.

English: An Old Gift From an Old Friend
Traditional_Chinese: An Old Gift From an Old Friend

English: Happy 20th to us! Now that we've looked back on the last 20 years, we arrive to today. Flyff Universe was launched in May of 2022, and brings Madrigal to many different corners of the world.
Traditional_Chinese: Happy 20th to us! Now that we've looked back on the last 20 years, we arrive to today. Flyff Universe was launched in May of 2022, and brings Madrigal to many different corners of the world.

English: As we continue to appreciate Flyff and its memories over the next 20 years, why don't you do one final, iconic task for me?
Traditional_Chinese: As we continue to appreciate Flyff and its memories over the next 20 years, why don't you do one final, iconic task for me?

English: I want you to head back to flaris and speak with Mr. Flyff, right after you kill some Mothbees on your flying device!
Traditional_Chinese: I want you to head back to flaris and speak with Mr. Flyff, right after you kill some Mothbees on your flying device!

English: He's waiting for you!
Traditional_Chinese: He's waiting for you!

English: He's going to wait for another 20 years, no problem.
Traditional_Chinese: He's going to wait for another 20 years, no problem.

English: Welcome back! As promised, here's your token of participation, wear it proudly.
Traditional_Chinese: Welcome back! As promised, here's your token of participation, wear it proudly.

English: To The Skies, For Fun!
Traditional_Chinese: To The Skies, For Fun!
